episode.location: [THREE] rangers of the [NIGHT] ['S] [WATCH] ser [WAYMAR] [ROYCE] , will , and [GARED] depart from the [WALL] to investigate reports of [WILDLINGS] in the haunted [FOREST] which lies to the [NORTH] , [BEYOND] the [WALL] . will , the best scout in the group , discovers a number of wildling corpses dismembered and arranged in a strange , ritualistic fashion on the ground . wight of wildling girl . he also finds a [DEAD] wildling girl pinned to a tree . he reports back to the others . ser [WAYMAR] overrides the older [GARED] ['S] advice that they return to [CASTLE BLACK] to report the situation to their superiors and instead insists on seeing the corpses for himself , to determine what killed them . when they reach the site , the bodies have disappeared . will scouts around for clues , but [GARED] finds a bloody piece of clothing buried under the [SNOW] . further investigations are curtailed when a tall , humanoid figure with glowing blue eyes , a [WHITE WALKER] , arrives and kills ser [WAYMAR] with ease . [GARED] attempts to escape but is caught and killed . will , in extreme horror , sees the [DEAD] wildling girl from earlier now walking with blue eyes , and also witnesses [GARED] ['S] death , with the [WHITE WALKER] tossing his severed head at will's feet . i

[NED STARK] draws his sword . some time later , will has fled [SOUTH] of the [WALL] in terror , rather than return to warn [CASTLE BLACK] of the [WHITE WALKER] threat . he is apprehended by outriders loyal to [HOUSE STARK] , the wardens of the [NORTH] , and is taken to lord [EDDARD STARK] . lord [EDDARD STARK] , in the courtyard watching his son , [BRAN STARK] at archery training , decrees that as a deserter from the [WATCH] , will is an [OATHBREAKER] and must [DIE] . will accepts his fate , but tells [EDDARD STARK] about the [WALKERS] [FIRST] and asks that word be sent back to his [MOTHER] . [EDDARD STARK] carries out the execution himself , using the ancestral [VALYRIAN] blade of their [HOUSE STARK] , [ICE] . [TWO] of [EDDARD STARK] ['S] trueborn [SONS] , 17 year [OLD] [ROBB] and 10 year [OLD] [BRAN STARK] , accompany him to the execution along with his bastard son [JON SNOW] , his ward , [THEON GREYJOY] , the master at arms [RODRIK CASSEL] and his leading guard [JORY CASSEL] . young [BRAN STARK] witnesses an execution for the [FIRST] time [WITHOUT] flinching , earning praise from [JON SNOW] . [EDDARD STARK] explains to [BRAN STARK] that the reason he was made to execute will was because the [MAN] who passes the sentence should swing the sword . when [BRAN STARK] asks his father about will's talk of [WHITE WALKERS] , [EDDARD STARK] dismisses it as a madman's ramblings , insisting that the [WHITE WALKERS] have been gone for centuries . the party sets out to return to [WINTERFELL] . the [STARKS] [COME] across the direwolves . on the way back to the [CASTLE BLACK] , the party finds a stag [DEAD] in the road , partially disemboweled . looking for what killed it , they find a [DEAD] female direwolf , killed with a stag antler piece [BROKEN] off in her throat . the female died after giving birth , and her [FIVE] pups huddle by the corpse for warmth . [THEON GREYJOY] advocates killing the pups , but [JON SNOW] convinces his father that this is an omen the direwolf is the symbol of [HOUSE STARK] , and [EDDARD STARK] has [FIVE] trueborn [CHILDREN] . with [BRAN STARK] looking on beseechingly , [EDDARD STARK] agrees that his [CHILDREN] should have the pups , but only if they raise them themselves with no help from the servants . just as the party leaves , [JON SNOW] finds a sixth pup , an albino runt of the litter . [THEON GREYJOY] mockingly points out that this one belongs to [JON SNOW] . in king's [LANDING] , the capital [CITY] of the [SEVEN KINGDOMS] , the bells ring out to commemorate the death of lord [JON ARRYN] , the [HAND] of the king . as the [SILENT SISTERS] prepare his body for burial , queen [CERSEI LANNISTER] looks on . she is worried that [JON ARRYN] discovered something he shouldn't have , and [MAY] have told someone . she confesses her fears to her twin brother , ser [JAIME LANNISTER] of the [KINGSGUARD] , but he tells her not to worry , since if the king knew the truth they'd be [DEAD] already . she tells him he should be the [NEW] [HAND] of the king , but he doesn't want the job . he considers it too much work . [CERSEI LANNISTER] accuses him of taking nothing seriously . a [RAVEN] bears news of [JON ARRYN] ['S] death to [WINTERFELL] , where lady [CATELYN STARK] informs [EDDARD STARK] . he is particularly stricken because [JON ARRYN] served as a father figure to him , when he was fostered at the [EYRIE] . she also tells him that king [ROBERT BARATHEON] and much of the royal court rides for [WINTERFELL] . [EDDARD STARK] realizes that king [ROBERT BARATHEON] means to [NAME] him as the [HAND] to replace [JON ARRYN] . he ponders refusing , feeling his place is at [WINTERFELL] . over the next few weeks the [EDDARD STARK] [CHILDREN] grow used to their rapidly growing direwolves [ROBB] names his [GREY WIND] , [SANSA] calls hers lady , and [ARYA] names hers [NYMERIA] after a [GREAT] warrior queen . [JON ARRYN] names his [GHOST] , for his [WHITE WALKERS] color and uncanny silence . [BRAN STARK] calls his [SUMMER] and six year [OLD] [RICKON] names his [WOLF] [SHAGGYDOG] . [BRAN STARK] ['S] [MOTHER] catches him climbing on the rooftops of the [CASTLE BLACK] , just as the royal party comes into view . he promises to stop , but his [MOTHER] knows he is lying . [WINTERFELL] prepares for guests . [CATELYN STARK] wants to make sure that [TYRION LANNISTER] , a [GREAT] reader , has enough candles , and the young [MEN] of the [HOUSE STARK] get groomed , as they gossip about the queen , a reportedly [GREAT] beauty . [WINTERFELL] gathers to greet the royal party . all of [WINTERFELL] gathers in the courtyard as the royal party approaches . [ARYA] is late and annoys [SANSA] by not being [SILENT SISTERS] and respectful when they arrive . king [ROBERT BARATHEON] rides in with his knights , while queen [CERSEI LANNISTER] is in a large wheelhouse . lord [EDDARD STARK] presents his household to king [ROBERT BARATHEON] . [EDDARD STARK] and [ROBERT BARATHEON] greet each other warmly , and then [ROBERT BARATHEON] demands to see the crypts and pay his respects to [EDDARD STARK] ['S] deceased sister , [LYANNA] , much to queen [CERSEI LANNISTER] ['S] impatience . after [ROBERT BARATHEON] and [EDDARD STARK] depart , [CERSEI LANNISTER] sends [JAIME LANNISTER] to find their younger brother [TYRION LANNISTER] , who is a dwarf . the [IMP] has found his way to the brothel in the [TOWN] [OUTSIDE] [WINTERFELL] , where he enjoys the attentions of a prostitute named ros . [JAIME LANNISTER] tells [TYRION LANNISTER] , a [MAN] of limited height but with immense appetites , that he will be needed at the feast that [NIGHT] . [JAIME LANNISTER] has hired [THREE] more prostitutes for [TYRION LANNISTER] , to hurry [THINGS] along . [LYANNA] ['S] statue in the crypts of [WINTERFELL] . in the crypts [ROBERT BARATHEON] offers up his prayers at the tomb of [LYANNA STARK] , [EDDARD STARK] ['S] younger sister , whom [ROBERT BARATHEON] was betrothed to before she was kidnapped by [PRINCE] [RHAEGAR TARGARYEN] and died shortly after being rescued . he tells [EDDARD STARK] that in his dreams he kills [RHAEGAR TARGARYEN] every [NIGHT] anew . [EDDARD STARK] reminds him that [HOUSE TARGARYEN] was destroyed , but [ROBERT BARATHEON] replies not all of them . [ROBERT BARATHEON] formally offers [EDDARD STARK] the role of [HAND] , and [EDDARD STARK] asks for time to consider . [ROBERT BARATHEON] agrees , but offers a sweetener the [HAND] of his son , [JOFFREY] , in marriage to [EDDARD STARK] ['S] daughter , [SANSA] . a [GREAT] feast is held and [CERSEI LANNISTER] and [CATELYN STARK] exchange cordial [WORDS] . [CERSEI LANNISTER] seems more impressed by [SANSA] , thinking that she will be a [GREAT] hit at court . [OUTSIDE] the feast , [JON SNOW] works at his sword practice , angry that [CATELYN STARK] thought it would be inappropriate that a bastard should attend . his uncle [BENJEN] [CATELYN STARK] , [FIRST] ranger of the [NIGHT] ['S] [WATCH] , arrives to join the feast , and [JON SNOW] asks him to take him back to the [WALL] with him . [BENJEN] agrees to consider it . [TYRION LANNISTER] then arrives and talks to [JON SNOW] , suggesting that he is too pricklish and quick to take offense when his illegitimacy is pointed out . he should take the insult and wear it like armor , so that no one can hurt him with it . when [JON SNOW] angrily asks [TYRION LANNISTER] what he knows about it , [TYRION LANNISTER] replies that all dwarfs are [BASTARDS] in their father's eyes . [EDDARD STARK] and [CATELYN STARK] receive a letter in the [NIGHT] , delivered to maester [LUWIN] by a messenger from the [EYRIE] . the letter is from [CATELYN STARK] ['S] sister , lady [LYSA ARRYN] , the widow of [JON ARRYN] . in the letter , [LYSA ARRYN] says that [JON ARRYN] was murdered by the [LANNISTERS] and that they plan to conspire against king [ROBERT BARATHEON] . [LUWIN] counsels that [EDDARD STARK] should accept [ROBERT BARATHEON] ['S] offer to be [HAND] , so he can investigate the truth of the matter and protect the king . [EDDARD STARK] , while he would prefer to stay at [WINTERFELL] , agrees with [LUWIN] and accepts the offer . the next morning [EDDARD STARK] and [ROBERT BARATHEON] go hunting , leaving the [CASTLE] largely empty . [BRAN] indulges in some climbing but , while climbing a [BROKEN TOWER] , he hears someone moaning . he peers through a window and finds the queen and her brother engaged in a sexual act . [CERSEI LANNISTER] spots him and warns [JAIME LANNISTER] , who grabs [BRAN] . [JAIME LANNISTER] looks out the window to make sure nobody else is watching and only sees [SUMMER] . he turns to [BRAN] and asks how [OLD] he is . when [BRAN] replies ten , [JAIME LANNISTER] remarks with a sigh , the [THINGS] i do for love . with that , he pushes [BRAN] out of the window . a

in the [FREE] [CITY] of [PENTOS] , across the [NARROW SEA] , [VISERYS] and [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] enjoy the hospitality of magister [ILLYRIO] mopatis . [VISERYS] has arranged to wed his sister [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] also called [DANY] to [KHAL DROGO] , the warlord of a [DOTHRAKI] [KHALASAR] of forty thousand warriors . in return , [KHAL DROGO] will give [VISERYS] the [ARMY] he needs to reclaim the [IRON THRONE] . [VISERYS] prepares [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] for meeting the [KHAL DROGO] . he tells her what a beautiful young [WOMAN] she has turned into , and slips off her dress and fondles her breast . she is [SILENT] and looks away as if pretending it isn't happening . she steps into a [HOT] bath that has just been poured . this greatly distresses her maid who believes the [WATER] will scald her . however , [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] seems not to notice it and appears to be unharmed . [KHAL DROGO] arrives in [PENTOS] and approves of [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] . [ILLYRIO] and [VISERYS] discuss the quest to sail back to westoros , and [VISERYS] inquirers when the [WEDDING] will take place . [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] is not pleased with the arrangement and blurts out that she does not want to marry [KHAL DROGO] . [VISERYS] insists that she will , because in return [KHAL DROGO] will give him the [ARMY] he needs to retake their father's [IRON THRONE] from [ROBERT BARATHEON] . [VISERYS] adds that he would let her be raped by all forty thousand of [KHAL DROGO] ['S] [MEN] and their horses if it meant getting his [IRON THRONE] back . a short time later , [KHAL DROGO] arrives at [ILLYRIO] ['S] estate . after taking a glance at [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] , [KHAL DROGO] rides away [WITHOUT] having to dismount from his horse . [VISERYS] is concerned , but [ILLYRIO] assures him that , if he did not approve of [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] , they would have known . [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] in her [WEDDING] dress . later , [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] marries [KHAL DROGO] and a [GREAT] celebration is held . several people [DIE] in impromptu duels , which [ILLYRIO] says is a good sign a [DOTHRAKI] [WEDDING] [WITHOUT] at least [THREE] deaths is considered a dull affair . the bride and groom receive many gifts , but for [DANY] , [TWO] are particularly interesting . the [FIRST] is a box containing [THREE] beautiful stones . according to [ILLYRIO] , these are dragon eggs from the [SHADOW] [LANDS] [BEYOND] asshai that have turned to [STONE] with the passing of time . [DANY] appears to feel some connection with the eggs , but brushes it off for the time being . the [SECOND] is a selection of books containing stories and songs from the [SEVEN KINGDOMS] , given by ser [JORAH MORMONT] , an exiled [KNIGHT] of [HOUSE MORMONT] . ser [JORAH MORMONT] swears fealty to [VISERYS] as king and offers him his support and advice , which is accepted . for his [GIFT] , [KHAL DROGO] gives [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] a beautiful [WHITE] stallion . [VISERYS] asks his sister to make [KHAL DROGO] happy . [KHAL DROGO] and [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] ride down to the shore and consummate their marriage on the beach at sunset . [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] is visibly upset and terrified .
episode.info: [WINTER] is [COMING] is the [FIRST] [EPISODE] of the [FIRST] [SEASON] of [GAME OF THRONES] , preceded only by an unaired pilot [EPISODE] . it [FIRST] aired on 17 [APRIL] 2011. a 15 minute preview of the [FIRST] [EPISODE] was shown on 3 [APRIL] 2011. the [EPISODE] was written by executive producers [DAVID BENIOFF] [D.B] . [WEISS] and directed by tim van patten .
episode.plot: king [ROBERT BARATHEON] majestically arrives in [WINTERFELL] , the [HOME] of his [OLD] and trusted friend , [EDDARD STARK] , warden of the [NORTH] , with an important offer .

episode.location: the [DOTHRAKI] [KHALASAR] led by [KHAL DROGO] have departed [PENTOS] and are heading east . they travel away from the [FREE CITIES] and into the [DOTHRAKI] [SEA] , the [LONG] grassed plains that the [DOTHRAKI] call [HOME] . [VISERYS] [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] accompanies the [KHALASAR] , meaning to stay with [KHAL DROGO] until he fulfills his [END] of the bargain and provides him with an [ARMY] with which to invade [WESTEROS] , despite ser [JORAH MORMONT] ['S] suggestion . he tells [VISERYS] that he offended his liege lord , [EDDARD STARK] , by selling poachers into slavery . when he received word that [EDDARD STARK] meant to execute him for the crime slavery has been illegal in [WESTEROS] for centuries , he fled to essos . [VISERYS] laughs at the notion , saying such trivialities would not be punished under his reign . [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] is finding adapting to her [NEW] role as khaleesi to be a huge challenge . only [JORAH MORMONT] offers her some solace saying it will become easier . [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] is however fearful of her [NEW] husband and it is revealed that their [FIRST] sexual encounter has left her slightly injured . fascinated with her [GIFT] from [ILLYRIO] , [DANY] asks her handmaidens if they have ever heard of [DRAGONS] surviving in the east . they reply no , but [DOREAH] , a former pleasure girl from [LYS] , tells her an [OLD] story about how there used to be [TWO] moons in the sky . one wandered too close to the sun and cracked like an [EGG] , spilling out thousands of [DRAGONS] into the world . [DANY] ['S] [DOTHRAKI] handmaidens [IRRI] and jhiqui dismiss the story , saying that the [MOON] is a goddess , wife to the sun . [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] seeks the advice of her handmaid [DOREAH] . [DOREAH] instructs [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] on how to please [KHAL DROGO] in bed but also how to use her skills to gain respect from him . reminding her , you are no slave and should not have sex like one . [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] nervously puts these plans into action and is surprised to find [KHAL DROGO] responsive , particularly once she starts using her body in combination with the [DOTHRAKI] language to speak to him . i

[ROBB STARK] says farewell to [JON] . in [WINTERFELL] , [BRAN STARK] lies unconscious and badly wounded , his [MOTHER] by his side . [TYRION LANNISTER] insists that his nephew [JOFFREY] pay his respects to lord and lady [BRAN STARK] , since his absence has been noted . when [JOFFREY] refuses , saying the [BOY] means nothing to him , [TYRION LANNISTER] slaps him [THREE] times until he accepts his uncle's suggestion . [TYRION LANNISTER] then breakfasts with his other family members , informing them of his decision to journey [NORTH] to see the [WALL] before returning to king's [LANDING] . he also tells them that [BRAN STARK] is expected to live and notes [CERSEI] and [JAIME] ['S] guarded reactions . [CERSEI] visits [CATELYN STARK] , sitting by her son's side , and tells her that her [FIRST] child , a beautiful , [BLACK] haired [BOY] , died of a fever . she and [ROBERT BARATHEON] were grief stricken and her prayers and tears were for naught . she offers to pray for [BRAN STARK] ['S] survival , hoping that this time the [GODS] will listen . [JON SNOW] has [WINTERFELL] ['S] blacksmith , mikken , forge a [LIGHT] sword for his sister , [ARYA] . [ARYA] is excited by the [GIFT] and names it [NEEDLE] . [JON SNOW] also gives her advice on how to best use the weapon stick them with the [POINTY END] . [JON SNOW] urges [ARYA] to practice every chance she gets . [JON SNOW] then says goodbye to the comatose [BRAN STARK] , before departing at his stepmother's cold request . [EDDARD STARK] then says his goodbyes to his son and to [CATELYN STARK] , who is angered at his departure while [BRAN STARK] remains ill. . the [TWO] parties depart [WINTERFELL] . the parties depart [WINTERFELL] [JON SNOW] , [TYRION LANNISTER] and [BENJEN] [BRAN STARK] to the [WALL] and [EDDARD STARK] , [ARYA] , [SANSA] and the royal party [SOUTH] to king's [LANDING] . at their parting [EDDARD STARK] tells [JON SNOW] that , though he does not have [EDDARD STARK] ['S] [NAME] , he has his [BLOOD] . he also promises [JON SNOW] to tell him about his [MOTHER] the next time they meet . . [EDDARD STARK] says goodbye to his bastard son . days later , on the [KINGSROAD] [SOUTH] to the capital , king [ROBERT BARATHEON] calls a halt to discuss with [EDDARD STARK] some dire news that has just arrived . [ROBERT BARATHEON] ['S] spies have learned of [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] ['S] marriage to [KHAL DROGO] , whose [KHALASAR] is reported to number over one hundred thousand warriors . [EDDARD STARK] points out that the [DOTHRAKI] can not cross the [NARROW SEA] , as they have no ships , but [ROBERT BARATHEON] is concerned that the [SEVEN KINGDOMS] will soon face another war . a curious [ROBERT BARATHEON] asks [EDDARD STARK] about wylla , the [MOTHER] of his bastard son , but [EDDARD STARK] refuses to enlighten him . [ROBERT BARATHEON] reminds him that they were in the middle of a war and no one knew if they would ever return to their families . in [WINTERFELL] , [CATELYN STARK] ['S] refusal to leave [BRAN STARK] ['S] side is starting to cause problems for the smooth running of the [CASTLE] . [ROBB STARK] offers to work with maester [LUWIN] to put the [CASTLE] to rights . there is then a [FIRE] in part of the [CASTLE] , but this proves to be a distraction to allow an assassin to attempt to finish off [BRAN STARK] . [CATELYN STARK] holds the assassin off [LONG] enough for [BRAN STARK] ['S] direwolf to enter the chamber and tear out the assassin's throat . [JON SNOW] and [TYRION LANNISTER] discussing matters . traveling [NORTH] , [JON SNOW] and [TYRION LANNISTER] talk , and [TYRION LANNISTER] reveals that he reads books to sharpen his mind , his greatest asset and weapon . as it travels [NORTH] , the party is joined by several , [NEW] recruits rapists who chose to take the [BLACK] , rather than face the knife . [TYRION LANNISTER] tells [JON SNOW] that the [NIGHT] ['S] [WATCH] is not a noble institution of glorious knights defending the [REALM] against the horrors lurking [BEYOND] the [WALL] , but a dumping ground for the unwanted and for criminals . in [WINTERFELL] , [CATELYN STARK] goes to the [TOWER] from where [BRAN STARK] fell and finds a strand of blonde hair on the floor . she summons [ROBB STARK] , [ROBERT BARATHEON] , [LUWIN] and the [CASTLE] master at arms , ser [RODRIK CASSEL] and tells them that she suspects that the [LANNISTERS] tried to [KILL] [BRAN STARK] because he might have seen something in the [TOWER] . [ROBB STARK] and [ROBERT BARATHEON] are all for making war , but [LUWIN] schools them to caution . [CATELYN STARK] decides that [NED] must know the truth and resolves to travel [SOUTH] to king's [LANDING] and meet him there . ser [RODRIK CASSEL] will go as escort , while [ROBB STARK] will take charge of the [CASTLE] in her absence . . the [WALL] , as seen by [JON SNOW] ['S] party . [JON SNOW] ['S] party crests a rise and sees the [WALL] before them . [BENJEN] welcomes them , and [TYRION LANNISTER] seems impressed by the [WALL] ['S] sheer size . on the [KINGSROAD] , the royal party reaches the [CROSSROADS INN] , a noted waystop on the way [SOUTH] to the capital . [PRINCE] [JOFFREY] ['S] bodyguard , [SANDOR CLEGANE] , known as the [HOUND] , a [MAN] with half his face burned in a mysterious accident , introduces [SANSA] to ser [ILYN PAYNE] , the king's headsman , a frightening looking [MAN] who had his tongue torn out on the orders of the [MAD] king many years ago . [JOFFREY] saves [SANSA] from this unpleasantness and takes her for a [WALK] along the riverbank . they find [ARYA] practicing her sword work with the son of the party's butcher , [MYCAH] . [JOFFREY] pretends to take offense at [MYCAH] using a sword on the sister of his betrothed and starts to gleefully cut [MYCAH] ['S] face with his sword , but an outraged [ARYA] hits him on the head with a stick . [JOFFREY] quickly becomes violent and threatens [ARYA] at sword point , but before he can hurt her , [ARYA] ['S] direwolf , [NYMERIA] , attacks [JOFFREY] , biting at his arm . [MYCAH] runs off , and [ARYA] throws [JOFFREY] ['S] sword in the river before running off herself . [SANSA] tries to help [JOFFREY] , but he spitefully tells her to leave him alone and go for help . [ARYA] , knowing that [NYMERIA] will be punished for injuring the [PRINCE] , forces the direwolf to flee by throwing a [ROCK] at her . she is then taken before the king , who is angered that a minor fracas has become a major incident , with his wife and [NEW] [HAND] blaming one another's [CHILDREN] . he decides to let [NED] discipline [ARYA] while he will do the same to [JOFFREY] , but [CERSEI] demands that the direwolf be executed . when [NYMERIA] can not be found , [CERSEI] spitefully requests that [SANSA] ['S] direwolf lady be killed instead , and [ROBERT BARATHEON] acquiesces , upsetting [SANSA] and angering [ARYA] . furious , [EDDARD] attends to the matter himself , passing the [HOUND] arriving with [MYCAH] ['S] bloodied corpse . [EDDARD] is shocked and disgusted , and when he asks if the [HOUND] ran [MYCAH] down , the [HOUND] responds he ran , but not very fast . [EDDARD] kills lady with a dagger , and hundreds of miles away , [BRAN STARK] awakens .
episode.info: the [KINGSROAD] is the [SECOND] [EPISODE] of the [FIRST] [SEASON] of [GAME OF THRONES] . it is the [SECOND] [EPISODE] of the series overall . it [FIRST] aired on [APRIL] 24 , 2011. it was written by executive producers [DAVID BENIOFF] [D.B] . [WEISS] and directed by tim van patten .
episode.plot: [JON SNOW] prepares to depart for the [WALL] .

episode.location: the [BRAN STARK] party arrives in king's [LANDING] . the royal party reaches king's [LANDING] . almost immediately , lord [EDDARD STARK] is asked to attend a meeting of the king's [SMALL COUNCIL] and to change his clothes , but he refuses to the latter . before that he encounters [JAIME LANNISTER] in the [THRONE] room . [JAIME LANNISTER] is still unhappy that [EDDARD STARK] judged him dishonorable for killing the [MAD] king , the murderer of [EDDARD STARK] ['S] father and brother . [JAIME LANNISTER] is unrepentant about it . [EDDARD STARK] meets the [SMALL COUNCIL] members lord [PETYR] [LITTLEFINGER] [BAELISH] , the king's master of coin and a friend of [EDDARD STARK] ['S] wife from childhood [GRAND] maester [PYCELLE] , the king's adviser in all matters scientific and academic lord [RENLY] [ROBERT BARATHEON] , the youngest of the king's [TWO] [BROTHERS] and master of [LAWS] and [VARYS] , a eunuch and the master of whisperers the head of the king's intelligence network . [VARYS] tells [EDDARD STARK] that the [SMALL COUNCIL] members heard about his troubles on the [KINGSROAD] and that they pray for [JOFFREY] ['S] recovery . [EDDARD STARK] grimly responds it's a shame no one prayed for the butcher's [BOY] , which visibly upsets [VARYS] . [EDDARD STARK] is stunned to learn that the [CROWN] is six million gold [DRAGONS] in debt , half of which is to lord [TYWIN LANNISTER] . to make matters worse , king [ROBERT BARATHEON] has just ordered a lavish tournament to celebrate [EDDARD STARK] ['S] appointment . he resolves to advise [ROBERT BARATHEON] to cancel the tournament , but the [SMALL COUNCIL] is doubtful that the king will listen . [CERSEI] and her son [JOFFREY] . queen [CERSEI] talks to [JOFFREY] about the incident on the river . she tells him that when he is king , the truth will be whatever he decides it will be . [JOFFREY] thinks there will be trouble with the [STARKS] , and promises that when he is king , he will double their taxes , force them to contribute to a standing [ARMY] and , should they object , crush them and install someone loyal , such as his [GREAT] uncle [KEVAN] , as warden of the [NORTH] . [CERSEI] points out that the [NORTH] is too vast and wild to be militarily conquered by outsiders , and a king needs to be more clever . she also advises him to be kind to his betrothed [SANSA STARK] to avoid stirring up trouble for later , and concludes that anyone who isn't us is an enemy . [ARYA] and [SANSA STARK] are still at odds over the incident with [JOFFREY] and her direwolf . [EDDARD STARK] explains that [SANSA STARK] was put in a difficult position by the king and queen , and while she shouldn't have lied , winning the [LONG] term approval of [JOFFREY] , her future husband , was important . [ARYA] is unhappy with the situation , but [EDDARD STARK] mollifies her by allowing her to practice with her sword , [NEEDLE] . [CATELYN] and [RODRIK] arrive in king's [LANDING] . [CATELYN STARK] and ser [RODRIK] arrive at king's [LANDING] and attempt to sneak into the [CITY] , but are spotted by one of [LITTLEFINGER] ['S] [MEN] . they are taken to meet [LITTLEFINGER] at a brothel he owns , where lord [VARYS] is also waiting one of his'little birds' told him they were [COMING] . [CATELYN STARK] is angered by the way they've been treated , but asks [LITTLEFINGER] for aid in finding the people who tried to have [BRAN STARK] killed . [LITTLEFINGER] is able to answer this quickly the elaborate dagger wielded by the assassin used to be his , but he lost it in a gamble with [TYRION LANNISTER] . [EDDARD STARK] threatens lord [BAELISH] . [LITTLEFINGER] fetches [EDDARD STARK] to meet his wife , but [EDDARD STARK] suspects a trick and pushes [LITTLEFINGER] up against a [WALL] [OUTSIDE] the brothel wanting to know what his [GAME] is . [CATELYN STARK] then appears , and [EDDARD STARK] is pacified . after hearing her news , he vows to find the truth and expose the [LANNISTERS] to [ROBERT BARATHEON] . [LITTLEFINGER] agrees to be his ally in this , for the affection he once bore [CATELYN STARK] as a youngster . ravens arrive at king's [LANDING] with news of [BRAN STARK] ['S] recovery . [CERSEI] fears he will expose their secret , but [JAIME LANNISTER] comforts her . [JAIME LANNISTER] comforts [CERSEI] . elsewhere , [ROBERT BARATHEON] swaps [OLD] war stories with ser [BARRISTAN SELMY] , a distinguished and famous [KNIGHT] and the commander of the [KINGSGUARD] . summoning [JAIME LANNISTER] , [ROBERT BARATHEON] jokingly questions him about [AERYS TARGARYEN] ['S] death , wondering if the [MAD] king died begging for [MERCY] , but [JAIME LANNISTER] rather coldly replies that the master he betrayed died screaming the same [WORDS] he'd been saying since the [SIEGE] of king's [LANDING] began burn them all . [EDDARD STARK] has contracted a swordmaster , [SYRIO FOREL] , the former [FIRST] sword of [BRAAVOS] , to teach [ARYA] how to use her sword properly . [ARYA] is thrilled , and'the [DANCE]' begins . as [EDDARD STARK] watches them practice , his pleasure at seeing [ARYA] happy sours when he realizes that a conflict between the [STARKS] and [LANNISTERS] [MAY] be inevitable his daughter [MAY] well be training herself for war .

[OLD] [NAN] tells [BRAN STARK] of [WINTER] and the [LONG] [KNIGHT] . at [WINTERFELL] , [BRAN STARK] has awoken but has no memory of his accident . his injuries have left him bedridden and unlikely to [WALK] again . [OLD] [NAN] , the oldest servant in the [CASTLE] , tells [BRAN STARK] stories to pass the time , but he doesn't want her usual heroic stories about the likes of ser duncan the tall . she instead speaks of the [WHITE WALKERS] and the [COMING] of a vast [WINTER] that will blanket the world . when [ROBB] pays a visit , [BRAN STARK] asks his brother if it is true that his legs are crushed and that he will [NEVER] [WALK] again . [ROBB] reluctantly says this is so . [BRAN STARK] remarks that he would rather be [DEAD] .

at [CASTLE BLACK] , the primary redoubt of the [KNIGHT] ['S] [WATCH] in the [SHADOW] of the [WALL] , [JON SNOW] shows his worth to the trainer , ser [ALLISER THORNE] , by besting several fellow members of the [WATCH] in the practice yard . [ALLISER THORNE] is disgusted at the poor performance of the others but has no praise for [JON SNOW] either , dubbing him lord [JON SNOW] and describing him as the least useless person here . watching over the [NEW] recruits with lord commander [JEOR MORMONT] , [TYRION LANNISTER] notes [ALLISER THORNE] ['S] stern and unusual ways , but [JEOR MORMONT] doesn't care as he only requires [ALLISER THORNE] to turn the thieves and runaways into [MEN] of the [KNIGHT] ['S] [WATCH] . later on , several of the other recruits gang up on [JON SNOW] , but the situation is defused by [TYRION LANNISTER] . [TYRION LANNISTER] points out to [JON SNOW] that none of the other recruits had the benefit of a skilled master at arms to train them , and that [JON SNOW] is alienating them through his standoffish attitude and superior combat skills . [BENJEN] talks with [JON SNOW] on the [WALL] . [BENJEN] [BRAN STARK] meets [JON SNOW] atop the [WALL] and tells him he is going on a ranging in the haunted [FOREST] . he refuses to take [JON SNOW] with him , telling him he isn't ready , and that here rank and nobility mean nothing every [MAN] must earn everything he gets . before departing , [BENJEN] stops by the eating area to farewell [YOREN] , a fellow [KNIGHT] ['S] watchman who scouts for [NEW] recruits in the capital . [BENJEN] also scolds [TYRION LANNISTER] for his naivety regarding what is [NORTH] of the [WALL] and states that [TYRION LANNISTER] has no authority to say what is or isn't [BEYOND] the [WALL] as he hasn't been out there himself . later , [TYRION LANNISTER] discusses [NORTH] of the [WALL] with [JEOR MORMONT] and his chief adviser , the ancient and blind maester [AEMON] . [JEOR MORMONT] asks for [TYRION LANNISTER] to intercede at court and get the [WATCH] more [MEN] as they are dangerously undermanned . [AEMON] warns that the [BRAN STARK] [WORDS] are right a terrible [WINTER] is [COMING] and more dangerous [THINGS] than just [WILDLINGS] might [COME] with it after all , one of their number swore that the [WHITE WALKERS] had returned ... right up to the moment [NED STARK] cut his head off . [TYRION LANNISTER] admits his skepticism that supernatural creatures might exist , but he agrees to bring word to his queen . before departing for king's [LANDING] , [TYRION LANNISTER] fulfils an [OLD] ambition by climbing to the top of the [WALL] and urinating off the edge of it . he and [JON SNOW] share a moment of fellowship before [TYRION LANNISTER] departs for the capital in the company of [YOREN] . a

[DAENERYS] rides with the [KHALASAR] . [DAENERYS] commands the [KHALASAR] to halt on a whim , exercising her growing authority and power . [VISERYS] does not take well to being commanded and threatens his sister . he is strangled by [RAKHARO] , a [DOTHRAKI] warrior wielding a whip . [DAENERYS] calms the situation and [VISERYS] is forced to [WALK] , a sign of shame amongst the horse riding [DOTHRAKI] . later , [IRRI] reveals to [DAENERYS] that [DAENERYS] is pregnant . [DAENERYS] relays the news to [KHAL DROGO] and tells him she thinks it will be a [BOY] as they lie naked in each other's arms . ser [JORAH MORMONT] and [RAKHARO] compare the westerosi and [DOTHRAKI] ways of [BATTLE] the heavily armored but slow knights versus the lightly armored but fast moving horse warriors . [JORAH MORMONT] has heard of [RAKHARO] ['S] father , a [GREAT] warrior , but admits that he disgraced his own father , a [MAN] of [GREAT] [HONOR] . when he learns that [DAENERYS] is pregnant , he announces he must split off from the column to ride to the [FREE] [CITY] of qohor , but will rejoin them before they reach [VAES DOTHRAK] .
episode.info: lord [JON SNOW] is the third [EPISODE] of the [FIRST] [SEASON] of [GAME OF THRONES] . it is the third [EPISODE] of the series overall . it [FIRST] aired on [MAY] 1 , 2011. it was written by executive producers [DAVID BENIOFF] [D.B] . [WEISS] and directed by brian kirk .
episode.plot: [JON SNOW] attempts to find his footing at [CASTLE BLACK] amidst hostility and suspicion from his fellow members of the [KNIGHT] ['S] [WATCH] . [EDDARD STARK] and his daughters arrive at king's [LANDING] . [CATELYN] renews an [OLD] friendship with a member of the court , while [DAENERYS] and [VISERYS] journey onwards to the [DOTHRAKI] capital of [VAES DOTHRAK] .

episode.location: [TYRION LANNISTER] speaks with [BRAN STARK] . in [WINTERFELL] , [BRAN STARK] has a nightmare in which he sees a [THREE EYED RAVEN] , sitting on one of the [STONE] direwolves [OUTSIDE] the doorway to the [BRAN STARK] crypts . he wakes up to find his direwolf [SUMMER] by his side . [THEON GREYJOY] summons [HODOR] , the [CASTLE BLACK] ['S] dim witted stableboy , who can only say the word [HODOR] , to help carry [BRAN STARK] down to the [GREAT] [HALL] , where [ROBB STARK] is hosting a meeting with [TYRION LANNISTER] and [YOREN] , both traveling down from the [WALL] to king's [LANDING] together . [ROBB STARK] very pointedly offers hospitality to any [MAN] of the [WATCH] , silently letting [TYRION LANNISTER] know he is not invited to stay at [WINTERFELL] . when [BRAN STARK] arrives , [TYRION LANNISTER] sympathizes with [BRAN STARK] for being a cripple , which annoys [BRAN STARK] , as does asking him if he likes to ride , but [TYRION LANNISTER] simply says it is the truth , no less so for being a hard truth . he gives the [STARKS] the design of a saddle which will allow [BRAN STARK] to ride even in his current state . he does it to repay [BRAN STARK] ['S] half brother's friendship and because he has a weakness for , [CRIPPLES] , [BASTARDS] and [BROKEN THINGS] . due to this kindness , [ROBB STARK] says he can stay , but [TYRION LANNISTER] says he would prefer the brothel in [TOWN] . while preparing to leave the [CASTLE BLACK] , [THEON GREYJOY] comes to [TYRION LANNISTER] and rather condescendingly sends him off , recommending the prostitute ros at the brothel . [TYRION LANNISTER] asks [THEON GREYJOY] why lady [CATELYN] was not present to receive him and concludes that [CATELYN] is not in [WINTERFELL] . he also taunts [THEON GREYJOY] about how the son of the ferocious [BALON GREYJOY] has been reduced to playing lackey in [WINTERFELL] to his captors , which infuriates [THEON GREYJOY] and gives him a coin , assuming that he has not already had sex with ros .

[SAMWELL TARLY] joins the [NEW] recruits at [CASTLE BLACK] . at [CASTLE BLACK] , a [NEW] recruit for the [KNIGHT] ['S] [WATCH] has arrived [SAMWELL TARLY] , the son of the famous lord randyll [SAMWELL TARLY] . [SAMWELL TARLY] is fat , soft and pampered , and in his [FIRST] practice fight does dismally . ser [ALLISER THORNE] has no time for his weakness . he directs the other recruits to attack'ser [PIGGY]' , but [JON SNOW] finds this cruel and unfair , and takes pity on [SAM] and fends off the attackers . [ALLISER THORNE] tries to turn it into a [GAME OF THRONES] , ordering [THREE EYED RAVEN] trainees take on [SAM] ['S] [PROTECTOR] taunting [JON SNOW] that he has found a [NEW] lady love , but [JON SNOW] nevertheless fends them all off . [SAMWELL TARLY] is naive and self deprecating , claiming to be a coward and craven , to [JON SNOW] ['S] astonishment . no one admits to being a coward , and [GRENN] says that they shouldn't even be seen talking to him . [SAM] joins [JON SNOW] on the [WALL] for sentry duty , even though he says his eyesight is weak , he is afraid of heights , and can't take the cold . [JON SNOW] asks why he joined the [KNIGHT] ['S] [WATCH] as he is afraid of everything . [SAM] tells him that on his eighteenth nameday his father offered him a choice . [SAM] was a [MAN] and his heir , but he was not skilled at combat , he was unworthy of his [NAME] and birthright . samwall's father forced him to join the [KNIGHT] ['S] [WATCH] , and told him that if he refused , he would arrange a hunting trip with his son in the woods , and implied that [SAM] would be killed in a way that looked accidental . [JON SNOW] is shocked that a true born son of [HIGH] birth should be treated worse than he himself had been as a bastard . [SAM] knows that the next day he will be made to fight again and expects it to be bad . [GRENN] yields to [SAMWELL TARLY] . at the [WALL] , [JON SNOW] orders the recruits to go easy on [SAM] , but [RAST] refuses , saying that if ser [ALLISER THORNE] orders him to fight'lady [PIGGY]' , he will slice himself off a side of bacon . in response to [RAST] ['S] comments , [JON SNOW] goes to his bed that [KNIGHT] and uses his direwolf [GHOST] to intimidate [RAST] into playing along . the next day , no one will fight [SAM] . after [GRENN] takes a very weak blow from [SAM] and yields , ser [ALLISER THORNE] scolds [JON SNOW] for his rebellious actions . later , when [JON SNOW] and [SAM] are cleaning the dining [HALL] , they talk about how neither of them have been with a [WOMAN] . [SAM] tells [JON SNOW] that he has not had success with girls , while [JON SNOW] reveals he'd rather not risk siring a child that will have the life of a bastard like himself . a furious [ALLISER THORNE] comes in and tells [JON SNOW] that this charity won't help [SAM] harden up to survive the [WINTER] that is [COMING] . he tells them the truly horrific experience he went through trapped by a blizzard [NORTH] of the [WALL] that [ENDED] in cannibalism . a

[KHAL DROGO] ['S] [KHALASAR] arrives at [VAES DOTHRAK] , the [DOTHRAKI] [CITY] . there are no [CITY] walls , but there is a large gateway arch made of [TWO] statues of rearing horses . [VISERYS] is annoyed that [KHAL DROGO] has been taking'his' [ARMY] in the wrong direction . later , he bathes with [DOREAH] and tells her about how he was raised with stories about the [TARGARYEN] [DRAGONS] and his own destiny . he recites the names of several [DRAGONS] , and tells her about the skulls of [DRAGONS] that once decorated the [THRONE] room at king's [LANDING] , but she starts to annoy him with talk of [DRAGONS] , reminding him that they are [DEAD] . he tells her to finish pleasuring him in silence . [VISERYS] is enraged when [DAENERYS] sends [DOREAH] with an invite for him to dine with her , as he interprets this as his sister commanding him to [COME] . he drags [DOREAH] into [DAENERYS]' tent , and insults her dinner and the gifts of clothes she tries to give him . he is still dressed in his now ragged clothes from [PENTOS] , having refused to dress like a [DOTHRAKI] , whom he regards as savage pordh . he sneers that next she will try to braid his hair like a [DOTHRAKI] . [DAENERYS] retorts that he has no right to braid his hair until he is victorious in [BATTLE] , which further infuriates him . in his anger , [VISERYS] tackles her to the ground and tries to strike her , calling her nothing but a horselord's slut , and warning her that she's awoken the dragon , but this time she fights back , hitting him in the face with a metal and leather belt . she tells a thunderstruck [VISERYS] that she is the [KHAL DROGO] ['S] wife , and is carrying his child and by implication , [VISERYS] is nothing to the [DOTHRAKI] , and warns that if he raises a [HAND] against her again , he will lose his hands . later , [DAENERYS] confides in [MORMONT] her realization that [VISERYS] will [NEVER] become king of [WESTEROS] . he is so weak and ineffectual that he couldn't command an [ARMY] even if [KHAL DROGO] gave him one , to which [JORAH] agrees .

in the [RED KEEP] , [SANSA STARK] visits the [GREAT] [HALL] , where the [IRON THRONE] sits . she and [SEPTA MORDANE] discuss the expectation that [SANSA STARK] will have to provide [JOFFREY] with an heir . [SANSA STARK] thinks the [REALM] will hate her if she only has daughters , along with her belief [JOFFREY] is still angry over the incident by the river and her anger at her father over lady's death . the [SMALL COUNCIL] meets . during a meeting of the [SMALL COUNCIL] , lord [EDDARD] learns that the forthcoming tournament to celebrate his appointment is seeing the [CITY] swell with visitors , and has already resulted in a tavern riot , a brothel [FIRE] , [THREE] stabbings and a drunken horse race . he tells [LITTLEFINGER] that money will have to be found to strengthen the [CITY] guards , as well as giving twenty of his own [MEN] to [JANOS SLYNT] ['S] command , until the tournament is over . after the meeting [EDDARD] talks to [GRAND] maester [PYCELLE] about [JON ARRYN] ['S] last few weeks . [PYCELLE] said he did all he could to save [JON ARRYN] , but the illness was sudden and severe . he recalls that shortly before his sudden illness , [JON ARRYN] had borrowed a truly boring [BOOK] about the lineages of the [SEVEN KINGDOMS] , and his last [WORDS] were , the seed is strong . taking the [BOOK] with him , [EDDARD] comes across [ARYA] in the [HALL] standing on one leg as part of her training with [SYRIO] . [ARYA] asks whether [BRAN] would be able to live in king's [LANDING] with them now that he's awoken , but [EDDARD] states that he would have to regain his strength [FIRST] . [ARYA] then comments that [BRAN] had always wanted to be a [KNIGHT] in the king's guard , but will no longer be able to due to his paralysis . [EDDARD] confirms this to be the case , but states that [BRAN] will be able to do many other [THINGS] such as become lord of a holdfast , sit on the king's [SMALL COUNCIL] , or raise castles . when [ARYA] asks if she would be able to become any of those , [EDDARD] instead tells her that she will marry a highborn lord and have lords and princes for [SONS] . however , [ARYA] is not pleased with this response , telling her father , that's not me . she goes back to balancing on one leg as [EDDARD] looks on . [PETYR] talks with [EDDARD] . [LITTLEFINGER] meets with [EDDARD] and suggests that he [RED KEEP] his investigation into [JON ARRYN] ['S] death lower in profile . he also gives [EDDARD] some interesting intelligence [JON ARRYN] ['S] former squire has been knighted and will fight in the forthcoming [HAND] ['S] tourney . he also advises him to investigate an armorer located in the [CITY] . [EDDARD] decides that [LITTLEFINGER] [MAY] be more trustworthy than he [FIRST] thought , but [LITTLEFINGER] discourages him from thinking that way . [EDDARD] sends [JORY CASSEL] to question [JON ARRYN] ['S] former squire , ser [HUGH] of the [VALE] . however , deducing that [JORY CASSEL] was not a [KNIGHT] , ser [HUGH] simply rebuffs him and refuses to speak with him due to his much lower rank . [EDDARD] ['S] investigation leads him to a smithy in the [CITY] , where he meets master smith tobho mott and his apprentice [GENDRY] , whose work [JON ARRYN] was also apparently interested in . [EDDARD] realizes that [GENDRY] is one of king [ROBERT] ['S] bastard [SONS] , but can't work out why [JON ARRYN] would be interested in this [ROBERT] has many bastard [CHILDREN] and shows little interest in any of them . later , [EDDARD] sends [JORY CASSEL] with a message for king [ROBERT] , but upon arriving at his quarters , the sounds of many women can he heard [COMING] from [ROBERT] ['S] chamber . ser [JAIME LANNISTER] happens to be on duty and is angry that the king keeps him guarding his chamber while he cavorts with other women inside , flaunting his dishonorable treatment of [JAIME LANNISTER] ['S] sister in his face . he and [JORY CASSEL] reminisce about the [GREYJOY] [REBELLION] , in which they both fought for king [ROBERT] ['S] forces to put down an attempt by [BALON GREYJOY] [THEON] ['S] father to secede the [IRON ISLANDS] from the rest of the [REALM] . [JORY CASSEL] tries to leave [EDDARD] ['S] message with [JAIME LANNISTER] , but is rebuffed , as [JAIME LANNISTER] angrily states that he does not serve lord [STARK] . [LITTLEFINGER] , [ARYA] , [SANSA] and [SEPTA MORDANE] at the tournament . the tournament begins and [SANSA] watches from the stands . ser [GREGOR CLEGANE] , the elder brother of [SANDOR CLEGANE] , the [HOUND] , takes the field . his [FIRST] joust is with ser [HUGH] . however , the friendly joust turns nasty and [GREGOR CLEGANE] kills ser [HUGH] by accident , with a splinter of the lance impaling his [NECK] . [LITTLEFINGER] sits next to [SANSA] , and remarks that she and [JOFFREY] have had a lover's quarrel as [JOFFREY] is still giving her the cold shoulder . [BAELISH] then tells [SANSA] that [GREGOR CLEGANE] , the [MOUNTAIN] that rides , has a [DARK] reputation he pushed his little brother [SANDOR CLEGANE] ['S] face into a [FIRE] for taking and playing with a toy of his when they were young , burning him severely . [LITTLEFINGER] recommends that [SANSA] not spread that story around . [CERSEI] visits [EDDARD] at his chambers , remarking at how the [HAND] is not at his own tournament . though [CERSEI] attempts to start the conversation in an attempt to put the incident on the [KINGSROAD] behind them , [EDDARD] correctly deduces that she has an ulterior motive for her visit . [CERSEI] then wonders aloud to [EDDARD] what his true purpose is for being at king's [LANDING] , as she knows how little [STARKS] enjoy being in the capital . when [EDDARD] tells her he is to faithfully serve their king , [CERSEI] remarks that as his brother brandon was born to lead , [EDDARD] was born to follow .

at the [CROSSROADS INN] , [CATELYN] and ser [RODRIK CASSEL] , on their way [HOME] to [WINTERFELL] , are enjoying the hospitality of the innkeeper and , more reluctantly , the attempts by the troubadour [MARILLION] to ingratiate himself with them . he is doing a poor job when he asks if they would like a song , he is refused . they are surprised when [TYRION LANNISTER] and [YOREN] arrive . when told there aren't any rooms , [TYRION LANNISTER] holds up a gold coin and asks if someone has a room for him . quickly [TYRION LANNISTER] gains the favor of a sellsword , bronn , who agrees to give his room to [TYRION LANNISTER] . [MARILLION] draws the attention of [TYRION LANNISTER] to [CATELYN] ['S] table , by offering to serenade him while he eats , singing of his father's military victories . [TYRION LANNISTER] says nothing would more likely ruin his appetite , but as he is turning away , he recognizes [CATELYN] and is surprised at this meeting by chance . in return [CATELYN] tells the stunned [CROSSROADS INN] that [TYRION LANNISTER] tried to murder her son [BRAN] twice and that she asks their help in bringing him to the king's justice . the [CROSSROADS INN] is located in the [RIVERLANDS] , in the territory controlled by her father , so the knights present owe him their fealty . [TYRION LANNISTER] finds himself surrounded by half a dozen [MEN] with [SWORDS] , and in [CATELYN] ['S] custody .
episode.info: [CRIPPLES] , [BASTARDS] and [BROKEN THINGS] is the fourth [EPISODE] of the [FIRST] [SEASON] .
episode.plot: [TYRION LANNISTER] stops at [WINTERFELL] on his way back to king's [LANDING] and gets a frosty reception from [ROBB STARK] , despite an act of kindness for [BRAN] . [SAMWELL TARLY] joins the [NIGHT] ['S] [WATCH] , and [JON] becomes his friend and [PROTECTOR] . [DAENERYS] arrives at [VAES DOTHRAK] and finally stands up to [VISERYS] . [EDDARD STARK] continues to investigate the death of [JON ARRYN] . king [ROBERT BARATHEON] hosts a [GRAND] tourney for [EDDARD STARK] ['S] investiture as [HAND] of the king , to [NED] ['S] discomfort . [CATELYN] and ser [RODRIK CASSEL] stop at the [CROSSROADS INN] .

episode.location: [TYRION LANNISTER] and his escorts in the hills of the [VALE] . [TYRION LANNISTER] has his blindfold removed and finds that their party augmented by several knights and the sellsword bronn from the [CROSSROADS INN] is on the eastern road en route to the [VALE] of [JON ARRYN] . [CATELYN] notes that she said they were riding for [WINTERFELL] often and loudly . [TYRION LANNISTER] congratulates her on her cunning , while pointing out that his father will give out a handsome reward for his safe return a point that clearly piques bronn's interest . he also says that lady [LYSA ARRYN] has gone [MAD] since her husband's death and will try to [KILL] him in the [EYRIE] . [TYRION LANNISTER] also protests his innocence in the attempt on [BRAN] ['S] life and points out he'd have to be an idiot to give the assassin his own blade . before [CATELYN] can answer , the party comes under attack from one of the hill tribes . despite taking several losses , the party is able to drive off the attackers . despite having the opportunity to escape , [TYRION LANNISTER] fights , killing his [FIRST] [MAN] during the skirmish , and in doing so saves [CATELYN] ['S] life . afterwards , they resume their trek to the [EYRIE] . [TYRION LANNISTER] and [CATELYN] in the [EYRIE] ['S] [HIGH HALL] . in the [HIGH HALL] of the [EYRIE] , lady [LYSA ARRYN] holds court on behalf of her young son , [ROBIN] . [LYSA ARRYN] is furious that cat has endangered them all by bringing [TYRION LANNISTER] to the [VALE] . [TYRION LANNISTER] points out that if he is harmed , there will be war with [HOUSE LANNISTER] , but [LYSA ARRYN] is unconcerned about his threats , as the [VALE] is strongly defended and the [EYRIE] is impregnable . she orders him sent to the sky cells , [THREE] sided cells with the fourth open to a sheer drop down the mountainside , forcing [TYRION LANNISTER] to huddle in a corner and try not to roll out to his death in his sleep .

in [WINTERFELL] , [BRAN] is angry about his [MOTHER] ['S] absence . maester [LUWIN] tries to set his mind at rest about the matter , to no avail . however , when [BRAN] gets frustrated at not being able to practice his archery , [LUWIN] suggests that he could learn to use a shortbow , of the kind used in mounted combat by the [DOTHRAKI] , a notion which pleases [BRAN] . . [BRAN] and maester [LUWIN] discuss geography . elsewhere in the [CASTLE] , [THEON GREYJOY] enjoys the attentions of his favorite whore , ros , but becomes annoyed when she compares his prowess unfavorably to that of [TYRION LANNISTER] .

lord [EDDARD STARK] arrives at the tourney ground to speak to lord commander [BARRISTAN SELMY] about the death of ser [HUGH] of the [VALE] . [BARRISTAN SELMY] notes that he had no family or friends so he stood the [KNIGHT] ['S] vigil himself for ser [HUGH] . [EDDARD STARK] is suspicious of ser [HUGH] ['S] death , wanting to know how he could afford a [NEW] set of armor so soon after being made a [KNIGHT] . [BARRISTAN SELMY] reflects on the irony of them being on opposite sides of the war during [ROBERT BARATHEON] ['S] [REBELLION] and now they are working together . . ser [BARRISTAN SELMY] and lord [EDDARD STARK] discuss the death of ser [HUGH] . he also tells [EDDARD STARK] that king [ROBERT BARATHEON] is planning to joust during the day's activities . [EDDARD STARK] finds king [ROBERT BARATHEON] tormenting his squire , [LANCEL LANNISTER] , finally sending him off on a snipe hunt in amused disgust . [ROBERT BARATHEON] is adamant about fighting in the joust but [EDDARD STARK] tells him that he is too fat for his armor and the other knights would let him [LUWIN] . [ROBERT BARATHEON] is forced to admit that he's right but they can at least [WATCH] the joust from the stands . the [FIRST] tilt of the day is between the fearsome ser [GREGOR CLEGANE] , the [MOUNTAIN] , and the popular'knight of the flowers' , ser [LORAS] [TYRELL] . [LORAS] gives a beautiful flower to [SANSA STARK] , while [LITTLEFINGER] and lord [RENLY] make a wager on who will [LUWIN] with [RENLY] betting on [LORAS] . [LORAS] is riding a mare that is in heat , which confuses the [MOUNTAIN] ['S] horse , causing him to throw his rider . . king [ROBERT BARATHEON] is dismayed to find he no longer fits his armor . enraged at having lost , [GREGOR CLEGANE] [FIRST] decapitates his horse and then attacks ser [LORAS] . [SANDOR CLEGANE] comes to [LORAS]' defense , preventing his brother from killing him . they exchange several blows , until king [ROBERT BARATHEON] orders them to cease . [SANDOR CLEGANE] immediately bows to the king , while [GREGOR CLEGANE] storms off the field . ser [LORAS] declares [SANDOR CLEGANE] the victor of the match to the [HOUND] ['S] discomfort . in the [RED KEEP] , lord [VARYS] meets with [EDDARD STARK] . [VARYS] tells him that the king is a fool and will soon be [DEAD] unless [EDDARD STARK] can save him . [EDDARD STARK] wants to know why [VARYS] is telling him this now . [VARYS] tells him he had to be sure [EDDARD STARK] could be trusted . he calls [EDDARD STARK] an honorable and true [MAN] , maybe the only one in the [CITY] . he also confirms that [JON ARRYN] was assassinated with a poison called the tears of [LYS] because he started asking questions . [ARYA] is chasing cats in accordance with her sword training . she chases one into the dungeons under the [CASTLE] , where she finds the [GREAT] dragon skulls of the [TARGARYENS] in storage . she hears [TWO] [MEN] [VARYS] and magister [ILLYRIO] mopatis of [PENTOS] talking . [VARYS] says that events have been set in motion and the [REBELLION] and the [WOLF] will soon be at each other's throats . war is almost upon the [SEVEN KINGDOMS] , as they planned , but it has [COME] too soon . [KHAL DROGO] will not invade [WESTEROS] until his son is born and pronounced healthy , which is still many months away . [ILLYRIO] suggests assassinating [EDDARD STARK] to forestall the war , but [VARYS] refuses . [SANDOR CLEGANE] , ser [GREGOR CLEGANE] and ser [LORAS] at the tournament . afterwards , [VARYS] finds [LITTLEFINGER] in the [GREAT] [HALL] staring at the [IRON THRONE] . [VARYS] reveals that he knows about [LITTLEFINGER] ['S] assistance in [EDDARD STARK] ['S] investigation of [JON ARRYN] ['S] death and reminds [LITTLEFINGER] of the consequences that [MAY] befall him should the [LANNISTERS] discover his involvement . in response , [LITTLEFINGER] reveals that he already knows about [VARYS] having met with both [EDDARD STARK] and [ILLYRIO] just earlier that day , implying he knows of [VARYS]' allegiances across the [NARROW SEA] . their conversation is interrupted by [RENLY] , who informs them that [ROBERT BARATHEON] will be joining them at their [SMALL COUNCIL] meeting . [ARYA] escapes from the dungeon and tries to warn her father about what she overheard but she gets the [WORDS] muddled up . they are interrupted by [YOREN] , who has ridden non stop from the [CROSSROADS INN] to bring [EDDARD STARK] forewarning of [CATELYN] ['S] arrest of [TYRION LANNISTER] . [EDDARD STARK] keeps the information to himself , while [ARYA] asks [JORY CASSEL] about the state of her father's household guard . [JORY CASSEL] tells her she does not have to worry about her father's safety . at the meeting of the [SMALL COUNCIL] , king [ROBERT BARATHEON] tells [EDDARD STARK] that [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] is pregnant and her son will have a claim to the [IRON THRONE] . he wants [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] , the unborn child , and [VISERYS] [DEAD] as soon as possible . . [VARYS] secretly meets [ILLYRIO] under the [RED KEEP] . [EDDARD STARK] states that this act would be dishonorable , cowardly , and beneath their dignity . the other members of the [SMALL COUNCIL] [PYCELLE] , [RENLY] , [LITTLEFINGER] and [VARYS] all concur that [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] must [DIE] for the good of the [REALM] . king [ROBERT BARATHEON] orders [EDDARD STARK] to enact the order . he refuses and resigns as the [HAND] of the king , to [ROBERT BARATHEON] ['S] utter disbelief and fury . [EDDARD STARK] orders his household to begin packing . as [EDDARD STARK] is packing , [LITTLEFINGER] arrives and offers to take [EDDARD STARK] to the last place [JON ARRYN] went before he fell ill . [EDDARD STARK] agrees . ser [LORAS] and lord [RENLY] , who are lovers , meet in a bedchamber . [RENLY] complains as [ROBERT BARATHEON] is organizing a hunt in the kingswood , which will no doubt involve traipsing around the [FOREST] for a couple of weeks in the cold and rain waiting to [KILL] some animal . [LORAS] urges [RENLY] to claim the [CROWN] himself , offering him the allegiance of his rich and powerful family . [RENLY] dismisses the notion , since he is fourth in line to the [IRON THRONE] . [LORAS] points out that [JOFFREY] is a monster , that [TOMMEN] is only eight and laughs at the notion of [ROBERT BARATHEON] and [RENLY] ['S] other brother , lord [STANNIS] , ever becoming king , as he has the charisma and personality of a lobster . he also asserts that the people love [RENLY] and want to serve him because he is kind and doesn't revel in violence as his [BROTHERS] do . queen [CERSEI] and [ROBERT BARATHEON] share a rare drink and discussion about the [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] threat . surprisingly , [CERSEI] takes [EDDARD STARK] ['S] side , pointing out that the [DOTHRAKI] can not cross the [NARROW SEA] as they have no ships . . ser [LORAS] urges [RENLY] to consider his place in the line of succession . [ROBERT BARATHEON] agrees , but if they land and the knights of [WESTEROS] take shelter behind their [CASTLE] walls , the [DOTHRAKI] could simply burn and pillage their way up and down the continent until the smallfolk accept [VISERYS] as their king regardless . [CERSEI] suggests that the unified armies of the [SEVEN KINGDOMS] could defeat them but [ROBERT BARATHEON] says she underestimates the skill and ability of one [ARMY] with one leader and one purpose as compared to that of the scattered and patchwork armies of [WESTEROS] . their discussion moves to [LYANNA STARK] , which surprises [ROBERT BARATHEON] , as in seventeen years [CERSEI] has [NEVER] asked about her . he tells her that [LYANNA STARK] ['S] death left in him a void that [SEVEN KINGDOMS] could not fill . he also tells her that their marriage [NEVER] had a chance of success because of the [HOLD] [LYANNA STARK] ['S] memory has on him , and bitterly adds he can barely remember what she looked like . [CERSEI] says that she felt something for [ROBERT BARATHEON] once , even after they lost their [FIRST] [BOY] , for quite a while . she asks [ROBERT BARATHEON] if there was ever any chance for their marriage and he answers no . [LITTLEFINGER] brings [EDDARD STARK] to the last place [JON ARRYN] went before falling ill , which is one of littefinger's brothels . there [EDDARD STARK] meets another one of [ROBERT BARATHEON] ['S] [BASTARDS] , this time a girl , and her [MOTHER] , a blond whore named [MHAEGEN] . [MHAEGEN] remarks that her child has [ROBERT BARATHEON] ['S] nose and [BLACK] hair . [EDDARD STARK] asks [LITTLEFINGER] why [JON ARRYN] was searching for [ROBERT BARATHEON] ['S] [BASTARDS] but he says he doesn't know , offering the half hearted guess that maybe [ROBERT BARATHEON] suddenly took paternal interest in them . [EDDARD STARK] looks skeptical of that reason . leaving the brothel , [EDDARD STARK] , [JORY CASSEL] , and the [TWO] guards that accompanied them are confronted by a large group of [LANNISTER] guardsmen led by ser [JAIME LANNISTER] . [JAIME LANNISTER] has heard of [TYRION] ['S] arrest and demands an explanation . [EDDARD STARK] says that [TYRION] was arrested on his orders . . [EDDARD STARK] is stabbed through the leg by a [JAIME LANNISTER] guardsman . [JAIME LANNISTER] threatens to [KILL] [EDDARD STARK] but [EDDARD STARK] points out that if he does , [TYRION] will [DIE] as well . [JAIME LANNISTER] acknowledges that this is true , so he says he will settle for killing [EDDARD STARK] ['S] [TOMMEN] instead . there is a brief engagement in which [EDDARD STARK] ['S] [TWO] guards , heward and wyl , are killed by [JAIME LANNISTER] spearmen . in response , [NED] and [JORY CASSEL] fight and [KILL] [FIVE] of the [JAIME LANNISTER] soldiers . [JORY CASSEL] engages [JAIME LANNISTER] but is quickly killed when [JAIME LANNISTER] stabs him through the eye with a dagger . furious , [EDDARD STARK] crosses [SWORDS] with [JAIME LANNISTER] . [JAIME LANNISTER] is shocked and then exhilarated when the older [NED] is not as easily defeated as he expected . however , [JAIME LANNISTER] gradually starts to grow worried as [NED] ['S] [HIGH] level of skill becomes apparent . just as they are ready to clash again , a [JAIME LANNISTER] guardsman steps in and stabs [EDDARD STARK] through the leg with a spear , disabling him . [JAIME LANNISTER] is annoyed at the dishonorable interruption and knocks out the guardsman . he departs , telling [EDDARD STARK] he wants his brother back .
episode.info: the [WOLF] and the [LION] is the fifth [EPISODE] of the [FIRST] [SEASON] of [GAME OF THRONES] and the fifth [EPISODE] of the series overall . it [FIRST] aired on [MAY] 15 , 2011. it was written by executive producers [DAVID BENIOFF] [D.B] . [WEISS] and directed by brian kirk .
episode.plot: [TYRION] ['S] predicament becomes common knowledge in king's [LANDING] , making life difficult for [EDDARD STARK] . [NED] ['S] position is already precarious due to a disagreement with king [ROBERT BARATHEON] over plans to assassinate [DAENERYS] before she can rally the [DOTHRAKI] to invade [WESTEROS] . in the [EYRIE] , [CATELYN] is shocked by her sister [LYSA] ['S] paranoia and distrust .

episode.location: lord [EDDARD STARK] wakes up after a [LONG] period of unconsciousness , due to the injuries inflicted on him by [JAIME LANNISTER] ['S] [TOMMEN] . he finds both king [ROBERT BARATHEON] and queen [CERSEI] waiting . . king [ROBERT BARATHEON] ['S] hunting party . [CERSEI] is furious with [EDDARD STARK] ['S] acts in having her brother [TYRION] arrested and attacking [JAIME LANNISTER] in the street . she wants [ROBERT BARATHEON] to take action against him , but [ROBERT BARATHEON] refuses to condemn him [WITHOUT] hearing [EDDARD STARK] ['S] side , and tells her to be [SILENT] . when [CERSEI] protests further , and calls [ROBERT BARATHEON] a [WOMAN] , he hits her . she says that she will wear the bruise with [HONOR] . he tells her to be [SILENT] , or he will [HONOR] her again , and [CERSEI] leaves in anger . afterwards , [ROBERT BARATHEON] restores [EDDARD STARK] to his position as king's [HAND] , and tells him not to quit again , or he will give the position to [JAIME LANNISTER] . he tells lord [EDDARD STARK] to [END] the animosity between [HOUSE STARK] and [HOUSE LANNISTER] , as strife between these [TWO] powerful [HOUSES] could lead them into war . he is leaving on a hunt and wants the [REALM] at peace by the time he returns . [ARYA] has another dancing lesson with [SYRIO FOREL] , but isn't in the mood due to [JORY CASSEL] ['S] death . [SYRIO FOREL] tells her that she [MAY] need to fight at any time , not just when she's in the mood . he wisely reminds her that being prepared to fight is more important in times of sadness than in peaceful times of happiness . king [ROBERT BARATHEON] is out hunting , accompanied by his brother [RENLY] , ser [BARRISTAN SELMY] and [LANCEL LANNISTER] . [ROBERT BARATHEON] , being supplied with wine by [LANCEL LANNISTER] , becomes drunk and nostalgic , longing for the days of young knights trying to make a [NAME] for themselves and when enemies stood openly in opposition instead of being hidden schemers . [ROBERT BARATHEON] brags about all the women he has bedded , but [RENLY] becomes irate when he begins to question him about his history with women . [RENLY] calls him a fool and remarks that the past had its share of violence that [ROBERT BARATHEON] is conveniently ignoring . [RENLY] storms off , leaving ser [BARRISTAN SELMY] to look on concerned , as [LANCEL LANNISTER] keeps up king [ROBERT BARATHEON] ['S] wine supply . in king's [LANDING] , at a meeting of the [SMALL COUNCIL] , a group of refugees [COME] to tell of how their villages have been destroyed . [EDDARD STARK] hears tales of a huge [KNIGHT] ravaging the [RIVERLANDS] . he realizes that it's ser [GREGOR CLEGANE] , the [MOUNTAIN] , who is likely under [LANCEL LANNISTER] orders to punish the [RIVERLANDS] which are held by [HOUSE TULLY] , the former [HOUSE TULLY] of his wife [CATELYN] , who now holds [TYRION] captive . even though king [ROBERT BARATHEON] told him to make peace with the [LANNISTERS] , lord [EDDARD STARK] could not bring himself to let this injustice stand . [EDDARD STARK] strips [GREGOR CLEGANE] of his knighthood , land , and titles , and sends lord [BERIC] [DONDARRION] with a retinue of one hundred knights to arrest and execute him in the king's [NAME] . . [EDDARD STARK] discovers the secret [JON ARRYN] died for . he also orders [GRAND] maester [PYCELLE] to send word to [CASTERLY ROCK] , demanding lord [TYWIN LANNISTER] ['S] presence in court to explain his bannerman's actions or be branded an enemy of the [CROWN] and a traitor to the [REALM] .'littlefinger' [PETYR] [BAELISH] , and [GRAND] maester [PYCELLE] are both concerned with the harshness of these orders and [EDDARD STARK] ['S] actions against the [LANNISTERS] , but [EDDARD STARK] wants to see justice done . [PRINCE] [JOFFREY] comes to apologize to [SANSA] for the incident on the [KINGSROAD] . he calls her his lady love and gives her a necklace . [SANSA] forgives him , and they seem reconciled . [SANSA] is unaware that the queen put [JOFFREY] up to the apology some time ago . [EDDARD STARK] decides to send his daughters back to [WINTERFELL] . [ARYA] is worried that she must leave [SYRIO FOREL] . [SANSA] protests that no one cares about her trivial dancing instructor , they are talking about breaking her betrothal to [JOFFREY] . lord [EDDARD STARK] says that he will find someone else for her . [SANSA] refuses she is going to marry [JOFFREY] and have lots of [GOLDEN] haired babies . this gives [EDDARD STARK] pause and sends him back to the [BOOK] that [JON ARRYN] was looking at before he died . consulting the [BOOK] ['S] entry on [HOUSE BARATHEON] , lord [EDDARD STARK] finds that every time a [HOUSE BARATHEON] has married , the [CHILDREN] have had [BLACK] hair right up to [CERSEI] and [ROBERT BARATHEON] ['S] [CHILDREN] , who are all blond .

stiv and [OSHA] accost [BRAN] near [WINTERFELL] . in [WINTERFELL] , [BRAN] has another dream about the [THREE EYED RAVEN] , in which it flies into the [CASTLE] ['S] crypts . he wakes up to find that [HODOR] has brought the finished saddle designed by [TYRION] . he goes on a ride with [ROBB] and [ROBERT BARATHEON] . they have had word from king's [LANDING] about [EDDARD STARK] ['S] injury , [JORY] ['S] death and [TYRION] ['S] capture . [ROBERT BARATHEON] thinks that [ROBB] should prepare the [NORTH] for war , but [ROBB] is determined to make his own decision for when that time has [COME] , and until then will follow his parents' orders to remain in [WINTERFELL] . they discover that [BRAN] has wandered off on his horse and go looking for him . [ROBB] finds a group of [WILDLINGS] threatening [BRAN] and trying to steal his horse . [ROBB] kills [TWO] , but another wildling holds [BRAN] with a knife to the throat . [ROBERT BARATHEON] shoots him from behind , angering [ROBB] by endangering [BRAN] . the remaining wildling , a [WOMAN] named [OSHA] , yields and begs for her life . [ROBB] agrees to take her as a prisoner . [ROBERT BARATHEON] tells ros he will miss her as she leaves for king's [LANDING] . ros , the prostitute that [ROBERT BARATHEON] frequently sees , is departing [WINTERFELL] for king's [LANDING] on the back of a turnip cart . [ROBERT BARATHEON] stops her and unsuccessfully tries to persuade her to stay . she explains that war is now imminent and the [MEN] and thus her customer base of [WINTERFELL] are destined to leave soon and probably [NEVER] return her departure is thus an economically essential decision . he throws her a coin to get her to raise her skirt one last time . as she rides off he says that he will miss her . she agrees that he will . [TYRION] ['S] verbal skills are wasted on mord .

at the [EYRIE] , [TYRION] almost rolls out of his sky cell in his sleep , to his consternation . he tries to make a bargain with the gaoler , mord , to no avail . [TYRION] convinces mord to carry a message to lady [LYSA ARRYN] and , in exchange , he will give mord the gold he had with him when he was captured . [LYSA ARRYN] summons [TYRION] , believing that the sky cell has [BROKEN] his spirit , but all he confesses to is being a liar , a whoremonger , and a player of practical jokes . he maintains his innocence of the crimes of conspiracy to commit murder . [TYRION] on trial in the [EYRIE] . however , [TYRION] uses the opportunity of his audience in front of [LYSA ARRYN] ['S] court to publicly demand his right to justice and a trial , and [LYSA ARRYN] is shamed into agreeing . given that [LYSA ARRYN] ['S] son is a young [BOY] and wouldn't make a good judge in a formal trial , [TYRION] instead demands a trial by combat , which [LYSA ARRYN] also reluctantly agrees is his right . given that neither [LYSA ARRYN] nor her young son can fight in a trial by combat , she asks for a volunteer to be her champion , and ser [VARDIS EGEN] agrees . [VARDIS EGEN] is unwilling to fight [TYRION] however , as killing such an outmatched opponent would be dishonourable . [TYRION] names his own champion his brother [JAIME] , considered one of the best swordsmen in the [REALM] . at this [LYSA ARRYN] does object , as [JAIME] is not present and she does not want to wait . she demands that he pick a champion from those present . [TYRION] desperately asks for volunteers , and after a [LONG] pause during which it seems that [TYRION] ['S] cause is lost , the sellsword bronn steps forward and says he will stand for him . bronn kicks ser [VARDIS EGEN] ['S] corpse out of the [MOON DOOR] . bronn fights defensively , waiting for [VARDIS EGEN] to tire , as unlike bronn he is dressed in full armor . bronn finally gets his chance he [FIRST] wounds and then kills [VARDIS EGEN] , sending his body rolling out of the [MOON DOOR] that leads to a thousand foot drop . [LYSA ARRYN] complains that bronn did not fight with [HONOR] . bronn agrees , but indicates that [VARDIS EGEN] did fight with [HONOR] . [TYRION] has proven his innocence in the eyes of the [GODS] . he retrieves his gold from ser [RODRIK] and gives it to mord . when [ROBIN] asks if he can make the little [WOMAN] fly now , [TYRION] says , this little [WOMAN] is going [HOME] . bronn and [TYRION] are allowed to depart . a

[DAENERYS] and one of her dragon eggs . in [VAES DOTHRAK] , [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] is studying her dragon eggs . despite [ILLYRIO] ['S] claim that they are now only [STONE] , she ponders if they might be hatched by extreme heat , and places an [EGG] on a brazier . nothing happens , to her disappointment . she is removing the [EGG] from the brazier , when [IRRI] comes in and thinks she will scald herself . [IRRI] takes the [EGG] from her , but [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] is completely unharmed , and it is [IRRI] who suffers scalding burns on her own hands . [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] is summoned by the crones who rule the [CITY] , the [DOSH KHALEEN] , the wives of khals slain in [BATTLE] . she eats a stallion's heart and the crones read the omens . at [FIRST] it seems [DANY] won't [KEEP] the raw meat down , but , to both her and [DROGO] ['S] relief , she is able to compose herself . the crones declare [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] and [DROGO] ['S] son will be the stallion that mounts the world , a [GREAT] conqueror whose [COMING] is [LONG] foretold in [DOTHRAKI] history . [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] says his [NAME] will be [RHAEGO] , for her brother [RHAEGAR] , slain by the usurper [ROBERT BARATHEON] . [VISERYS] is not impressed and rather disgusted by it all . he stands with ser [JORAH] who explains the ritual to him . it is only when the [DOTHRAKI] are chanting [RHAEGO] ['S] [NAME] , and [DROGO] lifts [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] up and carries her about the room , that [VISERYS] realizes they love her . . [JORAH MORMONT] prevents [VISERYS] from stealing [DANY] ['S] eggs . he storms out of the tent . [VISERYS] is later discovered in [DAENERYS TARGARYEN]' tent by ser [JORAH MORMONT] , trying to steal [DANY] ['S] dragon eggs , but [JORAH MORMONT] won't let him . [VISERYS] tells ser [JORAH MORMONT] that to rule one must be feared or loved , and he has [NEVER] been loved as the [DOTHRAKI] love [DANY] . he says he knows that [JORAH MORMONT] wants [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] , but he doesn't care . he just wants the eggs so he can hire an [ARMY] , but he can't get past ser [JORAH MORMONT] and must leave the eggs . [JORAH MORMONT] watches him as he leaves . drunk , bitter and angry , [VISERYS] interrupts a feast for [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] and [DROGO] . he angrily demands his payment in return for giving [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] to [DROGO] . then he draws his sword , which is considered an offense punishable by death in the sacred [CITY] , and threatens [DANY] and the unborn child , while [IRRI] translates to [DROGO] . . [KHAL DROGO] gives [VISERYS] a [GOLDEN CROWN] . [KHAL DROGO] responds that he will give [VISERYS] a [GOLDEN CROWN] that [MEN] will tremble to behold , and [VISERYS] is pleased until [KHAL DROGO] ['S] bloodrider [QOTHO] breaks his arm , making him drop the sword , and kicks him to the floor . [KHAL DROGO] melts his [GOLDEN CROWN] belt in a pot , while [VISERYS] begs [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] to help him . ser [JORAH MORMONT] tells her to look away , but she won't . she watches as [KHAL DROGO] crowns [VISERYS] by pouring molten gold over his head , causing [VISERYS] to cry out in pure agony . as [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] watches her brother [DIE] , she coldly states that , having been killed by [FIRE] , [VISERYS] was no true dragon .
episode.info: a [GOLDEN CROWN] is the sixth [EPISODE] of the [FIRST] [SEASON] of [GAME OF THRONES] . it is the sixth [EPISODE] of the series overall . it [FIRST] aired on [MAY] 22 , 2011. it was written by jane espenson , [DAVID BENIOFF] [D.B] . [WEISS] and directed by daniel minahan .
episode.plot: in [VAES DOTHRAK] , [VISERYS]' frustrations at the constant delays before he can receive his [GOLDEN CROWN] boil over . in king's [LANDING] , while king [ROBERT BARATHEON] goes on a hunt , [EDDARD] issues a decree that could splinter the [SEVEN KINGDOMS] and makes a startling discovery about the heirs to the [THRONE] . in the [EYRIE] , [TYRION LANNISTER] wagers everything on the greed of the sellsword bronn .

episode.location: on the borders of the [RIVERLANDS] , lord [TYWIN LANNISTER] has assembled an [ARMY] of sixty thousand [MEN] , with which he plans to oppose the [STARKS] and punish [CATELYN] ['S] capture of his son [TYRION LANNISTER] . . [TYWIN LANNISTER] discusses the future of [HOUSE LANNISTER] with his son [JAIME] . as he stands in his tent skinning a [DEAD] stag , he tells his elder son , [JAIME] , that this conflict will decide the fate of their family they will either forge a dynasty that will last a thousand years or cease to exist , as the [TARGARYENS] had done . he orders [JAIME] to become the [MAN] he was meant to be , and to take thirty thousand [MEN] and besiege [RIVERRUN] , [CATELYN] ['S] childhood [HOME] and the seat of [HOUSE TULLY] . [JAIME] ponders why [TYWIN LANNISTER] would risk so much for the ugly , stunted son that he hates , but to [TYWIN LANNISTER] a [TYWIN LANNISTER] is a [TYWIN LANNISTER] even though he considers [TYRION LANNISTER] the least worthy member of their family , any affront to their family must be punished or it makes them look weak .

[ROBERT BARATHEON] attempts to intimidate [OSHA] . in [WINTERFELL] , [THEON GREYJOY] attempts to bully [OSHA] , the wildling [WOMAN] captured in the recent raid . he insists that she refer to him as my lord , but she is unimpressed with his antics . she points out that he is not entitled to this , as his father is still alive . maester [LUWIN] dismisses [THEON GREYJOY] and questions [OSHA] about why her band crossed the [WALL] and were fleeing as far [SOUTH] as [SOUTH] goes . she claims that the [WHITE WALKERS] have awoken after a millennia asleep and are [COMING] [SOUTH] , to [LUWIN] ['S] skepticism .

[JON SNOW] and [SAMWELL TARLY] are standing [WATCH] atop the [WALL] when [BENJEN] ['S] horse is spotted returning , but , to [JON SNOW] ['S] horror , there is no sign of [BENJEN] himself . later on , lord commander [JEOR MORMONT] names the trainees as [MEN] of the [NIGHT] ['S] [WATCH] . he hands out assignments , but to [JON SNOW] ['S] disgust he is being sent to the stewards , not the rangers . he will work directly for the lord commander as his personal steward . his attempts to plead his case to maester [AEMON] who has selected [SAMWELL TARLY] as his own steward are met with indifference . however , [SAM] suggests to [JON SNOW] that while this move was possibly orchestrated by ser [ALLISER THORNE] to punish [JON SNOW] , it is also an opportunity for the lord commander to groom [JON SNOW] directly for command . both are then surprised when [PYPAR] admits that he was sent to the [WATCH] for refusing to give sexual favors to a lord , not for stealing a wheel of cheese to feed his sister as he had previously claimed . nothing about being sent to the [WALL] is [FAIR] . . [JON SNOW] and [SAMWELL TARLY] swear their oaths to the [NIGHT] ['S] [WATCH] . convinced , [JON SNOW] , along with [SAM] , say their oath of fealty to the [NIGHT] ['S] [WATCH] in front of a heart tree just inside the eaves of the haunted [FOREST] and are acknowledged as [MEN] of the [WATCH] . [SAM] decided to take the oath with [JON SNOW] to the [OLD GODS] of the [FOREST] , as the [SEVEN KINGDOMS] [OLD GODS] his father worshiped have [NEVER] seemed to answer him . after they take their oaths , [GHOST] finds a severed [HAND] in the woods and brings it back to [JON SNOW] and a horrified [SAM] .

[DAENERYS] tries to convince [DROGO] to invade [WESTEROS] . the wine seller is captured after trying to poison [DAENERYS] . in [VAES DOTHRAK] , [DAENERYS] attempts to convince [KHAL DROGO] about the benefits of an invasion of the [SEVEN KINGDOMS] , but [KHAL DROGO] is reluctant to cross the [NARROW SEA] , despite the thousands of ships they could find in the [FREE CITIES] to do the job . he says that a [WOMAN] doesn't need an [IRON] chair but only a horse . [DAENERYS] travels to the marketplace with ser [JORAH MORMONT] and her handmaidens . she asks [JORAH MORMONT] to help convince her husband since the [SEVEN KINGDOMS] are hers by birthright but he reminds her that her ancestor [AEGON] the conqueror took six of the [SEVEN KINGDOMS] , because he was capable of doing so due to his [DRAGONS] , nothing more .
