[TYRION LANNISTER] comforts the shaken [SANSA STARK] and personally escorts her out of the [HALL] . he asks her whether she wants to [END] her engagement to the king , but she continues to parrot the lines that she loves [JOFFREY BARATHEON] and will uphold her duty . impressed , [TYRION LANNISTER] remarks that she has learned how to survive around [JOFFREY BARATHEON] and might just make it out of her situation alive , respectfully calling her lady [SANSA STARK] . bronn suggests to [TYRION LANNISTER] that as an angry young [WOMAN] , maybe what [JOFFREY BARATHEON] needs is to have sex with a [WOMAN] , and that they should set him up with a prostitute . [TYRION LANNISTER] agrees that maybe this would give [JOFFREY BARATHEON] a chance to release his frustrations away from [SANSA STARK] . indeed , he might even be grateful for the gesture given that he didn't have much of a father figure in [ROBERT BARATHEON] to set him straight , doing something nice for the [BOY] might even be the [SECOND] chance [JOFFREY BARATHEON] needs to re establish a relationship with a male family figure . so [TYRION LANNISTER] arranges for [TWO] prostitutes from [LITTLEFINGER] ['S] brothel , ros and [DAISY] , to entertain [JOFFREY BARATHEON] . unfortunately , the attempt fails horrifically instead of trying to have sex with the prostitutes , [JOFFREY BARATHEON] brings a loaded crossbow into the bedchamber . at crossbow point , [JOFFREY BARATHEON] forces ros to beat [DAISY] unconscious , and then to dump her body in [TYRION LANNISTER] ['S] chambers , to send his uncle a message warning him not to interfere with his handling of [SANSA STARK] again . as [TYRION LANNISTER] works in his chamber late at [KNIGHT] , his cousin [LANCEL LANNISTER] knocks on his [DOOR] delivering orders from [CERSEI] to release [GRAND] maester [PYCELLE] from the dungeon at once . despite their [BLOOD] relationship [LANCEL LANNISTER] clearly holds [TYRION LANNISTER] in contempt and openly calls him [IMP] . curious , [TYRION LANNISTER] asks why [LANCEL LANNISTER] is so late delivering the message . blundering into a rather obvious trap , [LANCEL LANNISTER] retorts that he always delivers messages immediately and is [NEVER] late . [TYRION LANNISTER] then simply points out how odd it is that [LANCEL LANNISTER] would be [COMING] from [CERSEI] ['S] bedchambers in the middle of the [KNIGHT] . [LANCEL LANNISTER] nervously says [CERSEI] often works tirelessly keeping late hours , but [TYRION LANNISTER] also notices that he reeks of [CERSEI] ['S] favorite lavender oil perfume . [TYRION LANNISTER] enquires whether [LANCEL LANNISTER] was made a [KNIGHT] before or after he started sharing [CERSEI] ['S] bed . [LANCEL LANNISTER] falls apart , saying that [CERSEI] ['S] father ordered him to obey her every command when he became a squire to king [ROBERT BARATHEON] . [TYRION LANNISTER] sarcastically asks if [CERSEI] forced him to have sex with her too . [TYRION LANNISTER] wonders aloud what [JOFFREY BARATHEON] would do if he found out that [LANCEL LANNISTER] had not only killed [JOFFREY BARATHEON] ['S] father but was also sleeping with his [MOTHER] . [LANCEL LANNISTER] gets down on his knees and pleads for his life . [TYRION LANNISTER] gently instructs [LANCEL LANNISTER] that he won't tell , but from now on , [LANCEL LANNISTER] must report everything [CERSEI] does back to [TYRION LANNISTER] . as [LANCEL LANNISTER] leaves , he also casually agrees that he will accede to [CERSEI] ['S] request and [FREE] [PYCELLE] if she wants him as a pet , though he doesn't want him back on the [SMALL COUNCIL] . [PETYR] [LITTLEFINGER] [BAELISH] arrives at king [RENLY] [JOFFREY BARATHEON] ['S] camp as a political envoy from king [JOFFREY BARATHEON] at king's [LANDING] . he tries to gain [RENLY] ['S] trust by implying that if [RENLY] does march on the capital , he will help take down the [LANNISTERS] from within it is unclear if he is lying , but he is also ready to jump ship if the [LANNISTERS] lose , and [STANNIS] is not an option , because [STANNIS] despises [LITTLEFINGER] [RENLY] is tempted by the notion , despite his dislike for [LITTLEFINGER] . [LITTLEFINGER] then has a conversation with queen [MARGAERY TYRELL] in which he tries to intimidate her by hinting that her husband is homosexual . he does not anticipate that [MARGAERY TYRELL] seems to already know and not to care . [MARGAERY TYRELL] is not a naive ingenue like [SANSA STARK] but versed in court strategies she honestly believes that [RENLY] is the best candidate for king , and voluntarily entered into a paper marriage to secure the political alliance between [RENLY] and [HOUSE TYRELL] . [BAELISH] then meets with [CATELYN STARK] , who is still furious at his betrayal of her husband to his death . [BAELISH] [FIRST] tries to kindle a romance with her , saying that now they are both [FREE] , it [MAY] be that they can be together . [CATELYN STARK] simply draws a dagger and demands that he stop speaking . discouraged , he moves on to present [TYRION LANNISTER] ['S] offer that the [LANNISTERS] want to make a prisoner exchange with the [STARKS] if they release [JAIME LANNISTER] , queen [CERSEI] will release both [SANSA STARK] and [ARYA STARK] [BAELISH] lies about the [LANNISTERS] having [ARYA STARK] . [CATELYN STARK] insists that [ROBB] would [NEVER] allow the exchange , but [LITTLEFINGER] tries to manipulate her love for her imprisoned daughters . as a show of good [FAITH] from [TYRION LANNISTER] , [BAELISH] brings forward a pair of [SILENT SISTERS] carrying a box containing the remains of [NED STARK] . deeply grieving , [CATELYN STARK] tells [PETYR] to get out . she looks at the [BONES] with pain , but then shuts the box with a look of resolve on her face . the [SHADOW] wrenches itself [FREE] from [MELISANDRE] ['S] womb . king [STANNIS BARATHEON] then arrives at [RENLY] ['S] camp , along with the [RED PRIESTESS] [MELISANDRE] and ser [DAVOS] seaworth in his retinue . [STANNIS BARATHEON] has [COME] to treat with [RENLY] and give him the chance to willingly relinquish his claim and serve his older brother . [RENLY] , along with his [KINGSGUARD] members [BRIENNE] and ser [LORAS] [HOUSE TYRELL] , counters that no one wants [STANNIS BARATHEON] to be king . [RENLY] also scoffs at [STANNIS BARATHEON]' conversion to the religion of the lord of [LIGHT] . [CATELYN STARK] criticizes both [BROTHERS] for acting like sulking [CHILDREN] . [STANNIS BARATHEON] counters that it is odd that [CATELYN STARK] is standing alongside [RENLY] , given that her own husband [NED STARK] rejected [RENLY] ['S] initial plan to claim the [THRONE] and supported [STANNIS BARATHEON] as [ROBERT] ['S] rightful heir , even at the cost of his own life . in a display of leniency that is uncharacteristic for him , [STANNIS BARATHEON] offers [RENLY] that if he relinquishes his claim , [STANNIS BARATHEON] will grant him his [OLD] seat on the [SMALL COUNCIL] , and even [NAME] him as his heir unless [STANNIS BARATHEON] ever has a son in the future . [CATELYN STARK] reminds [STANNIS BARATHEON] that their common enemy is the [LANNISTERS] , but he will not hear it , again asserting his right to the [IRON THRONE] . [RENLY] states that the 100 , 000 soldiers waving his [BANNERS] makes him king , and [STANNIS BARATHEON]' [SMALL COUNCIL] [ARMY] is hopelessly outnumbered . [STANNIS BARATHEON] says that they shall see the next morning when their armies clash , and he departs . as she leaves [MELISANDRE] warns , look to your sins lord [RENLY] , for the [NIGHT] is [DARK] and full of terrors . [RENLY] watches his brother fade into the distance and asks his companions if they can believe that he loved [STANNIS BARATHEON] once . at king [STANNIS BARATHEON]' command , ser [DAVOS] rows [MELISANDRE] to some caves located near [RENLY] ['S] camp . [DAVOS] knows these caves from his [OLD] smuggling days . [MELISANDRE] asks him about whether he desires her , and his views on the conflict they are involved in between right and wrong , insisting that she is on the side of good . they find the way through the caves is blocked by metal bars . [MELISANDRE] takes off her cloak revealing that she is naked and heavily pregnant and promptly gives birth to a creature made entirely of [SHADOW] , as ser [DAVOS] looks on in horror . a

the main [GATE] of [QARTH] opens for [DAENERYS] . on the return of her bloodrider kovarro , [DAENERYS] receives word that the [CITY] of [QARTH] is nearby , and they are willing to receive the [MOTHER] of [DRAGONS] . ser [JORAH MORMONT] cautions that the desert surrounding [QARTH] is known as the [GARDEN] of [BONES] , as those who are turned away by [QARTH] perish [OUTSIDE] the [CITY] walls due to exposure and thirst . [DAENERYS] and her [KHALASAR] leave the [RED WASTE] and reach the [CITY] of [QARTH] . the [THIRTEEN] , a group of wealthy nobles and merchant princes , the leaders of [QARTH] , emerge to greet her , guarded by a group of shielded spearmen . one of the [THIRTEEN] , the spice king , speaks for the group . they request that the [MOTHER] of [DRAGONS] present her [CHILDREN] , but [DAENERYS] insists that her people be fed and sheltered before she reveals her [DRAGONS] . the [THIRTEEN] decide to turn [DAENERYS]' group away and abandon them to the [GARDEN] of [BONES] . [DAENERYS] swears vengeance on [QARTH] , with [FIRE] and [BLOOD] , should they not comply . [JORAH MORMONT] seems to find these threats rather reckless , but one of the [THIRTEEN] , [XARO] xhoan daxos , chooses to vouch for [DAENERYS] through sumai , a [BLOOD] oath by which a qartheen [MAY] vouch for a visitor . [DAENERYS] and her [KHALASAR] are let into [QARTH] .
episode.info: the [EPISODE] won a creative arts emmy award for art direction in a single camera series in september 2012 1 .
episode.plot: [TYRION] attempts to restrain [JOFFREY] ['S] cruelty . [CATELYN STARK] attempts to broker a peace between [STANNIS BARATHEON] and [RENLY] . [DAENERYS] and her followers arrive at the [GREAT] [CITY] of [QARTH] and hope to find refuge there . [ARYA] and [GENDRY] arrive at [HARRENHAL] , a [GREAT] [CASTLE] now under [LANNISTER] occupation .

episode.location: king [RENLY] is assassinated . king [RENLY] [STANNIS BARATHEON] is assassinated by the [SHADOW] brought into the world by [MELISANDRE] and fathered by [STANNIS BARATHEON] just after agreeing to an alliance with king [ROBB STARK] . his [KINGSGUARD] [BRIENNE] is mistakenly blamed for the death and she flees the camp with [CATELYN STARK] . [BRIENNE] later swears fealty to [CATELYN STARK] . [RENLY] ['S] [ARMY] disintegrates , with the forces of [HOUSE TYRELL] fleeing to [HIGHGARDEN] and the rest of his bannermen joining his brother king [STANNIS BARATHEON] . lord [PETYR] [BAELISH] accompanies the [HOUSE TYRELL] faction , sensing an opportunity to sway them to [JOFFREY] ['S] side . ser [DAVOS] seaworth challenges king [STANNIS BARATHEON] on his use of [MELISANDRE] ['S] magic and convinces him to leave [MELISANDRE] behind when they attack king's [LANDING] to quash rumors of her influence on him . [STANNIS BARATHEON] places [DAVOS] in command of his fleet . [HAND] of the king [TYRION LANNISTER] brings news of [RENLY] ['S] death to his sister , queen regent [CERSEI LANNISTER] . she is pleased , but [TYRION LANNISTER] predicts [STANNIS BARATHEON] ['S] imminent attack . he tries to discuss plans for their defense , but she insists on keeping them secret . from his spy , his cousin ser [LANCEL LANNISTER] , [TYRION LANNISTER] learns that [CERSEI LANNISTER] has been having extensive meetings with the alchemists' guild . . [BRIENNE] kills a [KINGSGUARD] . he visits wisdom [HALLYNE] of the guild and learns that they have stockpiled thousands of jars of [WILDFIRE] , a dangerously flammable substance , to use as catapult ammunition . bronn warns that this strategy could be disastrous , and result in panicking defenders accidentally burning down their own [CITY] . [TYRION LANNISTER] orders [HALLYNE] to answer to him instead of [CERSEI LANNISTER] . [TYRION LANNISTER] also passes a street protest that blames him for the ills of the [CITY] , as they believe [TYRION LANNISTER] to be manipulating [JOFFREY] . [THEON GREYJOY] takes command of his [NEW] ship and finds his crew insubordinate . his [FIRST] mate [DAGMER] cleftjaw tells him that he needs to prove himself to the [MEN] and [THEON GREYJOY] plans to raid [TORRHEN] ['S] [SQUARE] to draw the remaining forces of [HOUSE STARK] from [WINTERFELL] . his plan is successful and ser [RODRIK CASSEL] leads a force of 200 [MEN] to relieve his [SIEGE] of [TORRHEN] ['S] [SQUARE] . [BRAN STARK] provides well judged counsel to his subjects but continues to be troubled by his dreams . . [TYRION LANNISTER] discovers the [WILDFIRE] . he discusses dreaming of a [THREE EYED RAVEN] with the wildling [WOMAN] [OSHA] but she declines to interpret the dream . he also confides dreaming of the [SEA] flooding [WINTERFELL] and drowning his people , including ser [RODRIK CASSEL] . [TYWIN LANNISTER] hosts a protracted war [COUNCIL] to determine a [NEW] strategy to deal with [ROBB STARK] . [ARYA STARK] serves as his cupbearer . though he does not know who she really is , [TYWIN LANNISTER] realizes that she is of [NORTHERN] extraction and questions her about her origins and opinions regarding [ROBB STARK] . she manages to avoid revealing her true identity . she leaves to fetch [WATER] and encounters [JAQEN H] ['GHAR] , now a [TYWIN LANNISTER] [WOMAN] at arms . [JAQEN H] says that because she saved his life , and those of his [TWO] fellow prisoners , he owes her [THREE EYED RAVEN] deaths and offers to [KILL] [THREE EYED RAVEN] people of her choosing . she targets the [TICKLER] , ser [GREGOR CLEGANE] ['S] torturer . the [TICKLER] is soon found [DEAD] in the courtyard , his [NECK] twisted 180 degrees . [ARYA STARK] notices [JAQEN H] on the walkway above and he holds a single finger to his face to signify his responsibility . b

the [NIGHT] ['S] [WATCH] and [GHOST] on the [FIST] of the [FIRST MEN] . lord commander [JEOR MORMONT] leads his ranging to the ancient [FIST] of the [FIRST MEN] to rendezvous with the experienced scout [QHORIN] [HALFHAND] . [QHORIN] arrives and warns [JEOR MORMONT] that they must change their tactics to combat the wildling [ARMY] under king [BEYOND] the [WALL] [MANCE RAYDER] . he suggests sending a [SMALL] party ahead to neutralize [MANCE RAYDER] ['S] lookouts in the skirling pass . [JON SNOW] joins [QHORIN] ['S] group , while [SAMWELL TARLY] takes his task as the steward of lord commander [JEOR MORMONT] . a

[DROGON] , breathing [WILDFIRE] for the [FIRST MEN] time . [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] has taught her [DRAGONS] to breathe [WILDFIRE] on command and they are now capable of sharing and eating meat on their own . she is enjoying the hospitality of the wealthy noble [XARO] xhoan daxos in the [CITY] of [QARTH] . he hosts a gathering in her [HONOR] in the [GARDENS] of his [HOME] . she is perturbed by the tricks of the warlock [PYAT PREE] , who invites her to visit the [HOUSE STARK] of the undying . the masked [WOMAN] [QUAITHE] delivers an enigmatic warning to ser [JORAH MORMONT] about [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] ['S] need for protection from those who lust after her [DRAGONS] . [XARO] offers to fund [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] ['S] invasion of [WESTEROS] in exchange for her [HALFHAND] in marriage . later , she seeks [JORAH MORMONT] ['S] advice about the proposal and he cautions against accepting financial aid . he suggests that she will be able to [TYWIN LANNISTER] her [THRONE] should she reach [WESTEROS] with just a single ship . he reveals his depth of feeling for her but she does not return his affections .
episode.info: the [GHOST] of [HARRENHAL] is the fifth [EPISODE] of the [SECOND] [SEASON] of [GAME OF THRONES] . it is the fifteenth [EPISODE] of the series overall . it premiered on [APRIL] 29 , 2012. it was written by executive producers [DAVID BENIOFF] and [D.B] . [WEISS] and directed by [DAVID BENIOFF] petrarca .
episode.plot: confusion rages in the [STORMLANDS] in the wake of a devastating reversal . [CATELYN] must flee with a [NEW] ally , whilst [LITTLEFINGER] sees an opportunity in the chaos . [THEON] seeks to prove himself to his father in [BATTLE] . [ARYA STARK] receives a promise from the enigmatic [JAQEN H] ['GHAR] . the [NIGHT] ['S] [WATCH] arrives at the [FIST] of the [FIRST MEN] . [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] receives a marriage proposal .

episode.location: [THEON] approaches [BRAN] , then takes over [WINTERFELL] . at [WINTERFELL] , maester [LUWIN] frantically sends off a messenger [THREE EYED RAVEN] just as a band of raiders from [HOUSE GREYJOY] , led by [THEON GREYJOY] , take over the undefended [CASTLE] . [THEON GREYJOY] had lured the defenders away with a feint at [TORRHEN] ['S] [SQUARE] and then infiltrated the [CASTLE] using grappling claws . [THEON GREYJOY] tells [BRAN STARK] to surrender the [CASTLE] to him to save his people . [BRAN STARK] submits in front of his assembled people . ser [RODRIK CASSEL] is captured by [THEON GREYJOY] ['S] [FIRST MEN] as he is returning from [TORRHEN] ['S] [SQUARE] . he spits in [THEON GREYJOY] ['S] face , and [DAGMER] cleftjaw insists that [THEON GREYJOY] must [KILL] him , or lose face in front of his [IRONBORN] raiders . [THEON GREYJOY] botches the beheading of ser [RODRIK CASSEL] , requiring several hacks and a kick , horrifying the people of [WINTERFELL] . later that [NIGHT] , [OSHA] the wildling has sex with [THEON GREYJOY] , but then sneaks out of his room while he is asleep . [OSHA] frees [BRAN STARK] , [RICKON] [BRAN STARK] , [HODOR] , and their direwolves , [SUMMER] and [SHAGGYDOG] , smuggling them out of the [CASTLE] and killing one of [THEON GREYJOY] ['S] guards in the process .

at king [ROBB STARK] ['S] [ARMY] camp , [ROBB STARK] chats with [TALISA] , who has followed his forces on their campaign . [ROBB STARK] introduces [TALISA] to his [MOTHER] [CATELYN STARK] , who has returned from the [STORMLANDS] along with [BRIENNE] of [TARTH] . they are interrupted when lord [ROOSE BOLTON] arrives with the terrible news sent by [LUWIN] ['S] last messenger [THREE EYED RAVEN] . furious at [THEON GREYJOY] ['S] betrayal , [ROBB STARK] intends to march his [ARMY] back to the [NORTH] to repel the invasion . [ROOSE BOLTON] advises that the few hundred soldiers left scattered in the [NORTH] can be rallied by his bastard son , [RAMSAY SNOW] , who is in the [NORTH] at the [DREADFORT] . they could overcome the [SMALL] [IRONBORN] invasion force . [ROOSE BOLTON] warns that retreating the entire [NORTHERN] [ARMY] group would lose everything they have gained . [ROBB STARK] agrees , but insists that [ROOSE BOLTON] ['S] [FIRST MEN] take [THEON GREYJOY] alive so [ROBB STARK] can look him in the eyes and ask why before personally executing him .

at [HARRENHAL] , the main base camp for the [HOUSE LANNISTER] [ARMY] in the [RIVERLANDS] , [TYWIN LANNISTER] berates ser [AMORY LORCH] for delivering a letter to their enemies instead of their allies , because he can not read properly . he discovers that his cupbearer arry secretly [ARYA STARK] can read . . [JOFFREY] has excrement thrown on him by rioting peasants . [PETYR] [LITTLEFINGER] [BAELISH] arrives at camp and meets with [TYWIN LANNISTER] . [ARYA STARK] tries to hide her face to prevent [LITTLEFINGER] from identifying her . [BAELISH] discusses the assassination of [RENLY] [BARATHEON] , and the subsequent rallying of the noble [HOUSES] from the [STORMLANDS] under the banner of his older brother [STANNIS BARATHEON] . however , [HOUSE TYRELL] of the reach has retreated its large [ARMY] back to their capital at [HIGHGARDEN] , and has not joined [STANNIS BARATHEON] . [BAELISH] discusses with [TYWIN LANNISTER] the possibility of forming an alliance between [HOUSE LANNISTER] and [HOUSE TYRELL] . later [TYWIN LANNISTER] questions [ARYA STARK] about her origins . while [TYWIN LANNISTER] is distracted , [ARYA STARK] sees that a letter on his table is about her older brother [ROBB STARK] , so she snatches it . after asking [TYWIN LANNISTER] about his own father , [TYWIN LANNISTER] sends her to fetch more firewood . she takes this opportunity to read the letter , but unfortunately bumps into [AMORY LORCH] who sees that she is carrying the letter and grows suspicious . [ARYA STARK] runs away and [AMORY LORCH] heads to tell [TYWIN LANNISTER] . [ARYA STARK] runs to find [JAQEN H] ['GHAR] , telling him that [AMORY LORCH] is the [SECOND] [NAME] he owes her . just as [AMORY LORCH] reaches [TYWIN LANNISTER] ['S] quarters , he falls down [DEAD] with a poisoned dart lodged in his [NECK] .

the royal court including king [JOFFREY BARATHEON] , queen regent [CERSEI LANNISTER] , [PRINCE] [TOMMEN] [JOFFREY BARATHEON] , and [SANSA STARK] are at the docks seeing off princess myrcella [JOFFREY BARATHEON] as she departs in a ship bound for [DORNE] . [CERSEI LANNISTER] is heartbroken and warns [TYRION] that she will not forgive him for sending away her only daughter . as per [TYRION] ['S] plans , myrcella will stay in [DORNE] with [HOUSE MARTELL] until she comes of age to fulfill the marriage alliance to their youngest son , [TRYSTANE MARTELL] . the [HIGH SEPTON] of the [FAITH] of the [SEVEN] offers a blessing for her departure . the streets of the capital [CITY] are overflowing with starving refugees from the war of the [FIVE KINGS] , as [CERSEI LANNISTER] ignored both [TYRION] and [JANOS SLYNT] ['S] earlier warnings that something had to be done to care for the starving peasants or there would be mounting discontent with her son's rule . as the royal party travels back to the [RED KEEP] through the crowded streets , the starving refugees and commoners of king's [LANDING] plead for bread and hurl insults at king [JOFFREY BARATHEON] , and ultimately , someone throws cow excrement into [JOFFREY BARATHEON] ['S] face . despite being accompanied by only a few dozen guards facing hundreds of peasants , [JOFFREY BARATHEON] impetuously orders his soldiers to [KILL] the entire crowd . . [SANSA STARK] is almost raped . a riot subsequently erupts and spreads throughout the [CITY] . the royal party's guards are soon overwhelmed , and [JOFFREY BARATHEON] , [CERSEI LANNISTER] and [TYRION] barely make it back to the [CASTLE] unscathed . the [HIGH SEPTON] is literally torn apart by the mob . [TYRION] is enraged by [JOFFREY BARATHEON] ['S] shocking stupidity , for massively overreacting to having cow dung thrown at him , and for not realizing that his orders would cause a riot among the starving peasants and endanger the entire royal party . [JOFFREY BARATHEON] , still manically cursing the mob and demanding they all be killed , shrieks that [TYRION] can not speak to him in that way and petulantly reminds his uncle that he is talking to a king . [TYRION] then contemptuously slaps his nephew across the face but [JOFFREY BARATHEON] does not retaliate . the scant [TWO] thousand [CITY WATCH] guards have difficulty containing the riot , and chaos reigns throughout the [CITY WATCH] . [TYRION] realizes to his horror that [SANSA STARK] was lost in the crowd . [JOFFREY BARATHEON] petulantly refuses to send his [TOMMEN] after her , oblivious to her importance as a hostage or the fact that if any harm comes to her , the [STARKS] [MAY] retaliate by executing his uncle [JAIME] . [OUTSIDE] , [SANSA STARK] is dragged away by a mob of angry [TOMMEN] and is about to be raped , when [SANDOR] the [HOUND] [CLEGANE] arrives and slays her assailants . he carries [SANSA STARK] to the [CASTLE] and orders handmaids to take care of her . [TYRION] thanks him for saving [SANSA STARK] ['S] life , but [SANDOR] bluntly responds that he didn't do it for him . b

[JON] [FIRST] lays eyes on [YGRITTE] . the scouting party of the [NIGHT] ['S] [CITY WATCH] led by [QHORIN] [HALFHAND] has left the expeditionary base their main force set up at the [FIST] of the [FIRST MEN] , and continues searching for the [WILDLINGS] in the frostfangs [MOUNTAIN] range . they encounter a [SMALL] group of wildling scouts and engage them in combat , killing all except one a [RED KEEP] haired young [WOMAN] named [YGRITTE] . [QHORIN] orders [JON SNOW] to execute her while the rest of them continue on up the [MOUNTAIN] . [JON SNOW] hesitates , giving [YGRITTE] enough time to make a run for it . [JON SNOW] pursues and captures [YGRITTE] , but they have become separated from [QHORIN] ['S] scouting party . with darkness falling , [JON SNOW] and his prisoner have to settle in for the [NIGHT] , hoping to link back up with [QHORIN] when daylight returns . a

[DAENERYS] discovers that her guards have been slain and her [DRAGONS] are missing . in [QARTH] , [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] tries to negotiate with the spice king for ships to return to [WESTEROS] . however , he considers it to be too risky an investment considering that she has no [ARMY] and has no open supporters in [WESTEROS] and she receives nothing . returning with [XARO] xhoan daxos to his mansion , [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] finds her guards [DEAD] , [IRRI] strangled to death , and her [DRAGONS] missing . a hooded figure carries the [DRAGONS] in a covered box up steps towards a [TOWER] .
episode.info: the [OLD GODS] and the [NEW] is the sixth [EPISODE] of the [SECOND] [SEASON] of [GAME OF THRONES] . it is the sixteenth [EPISODE] of the series overall . it premiered on [MAY] 6 , 2012. it was written by co executive producer vanessa taylor and directed by [DAVID] nutter .
episode.plot: [ARYA] has a surprise visitor [DANY] vows to take what is hers [JOFFREY BARATHEON] meets his subjects [QHORIN] gives [JON SNOW] a chance to prove himself .

episode.location: at [WINTERFELL] , now held by the [IRONBORN] , [THEON GREYJOY] awakens to find that [OSHA] is gone and she has escaped with [HODOR] , [BRAN STARK] , [RICKON] [BRAN STARK] and their direwolves . [THEON GREYJOY] berates [LORREN] for allowing them to escape . when [LORREN] counters that [THEON GREYJOY] is also to blame for sleeping with [OSHA] and letting his guard down , [THEON GREYJOY] furiously beats him . [THEON GREYJOY] leads the [IRONBORN] on horse to hunt down the boys with hounds to track them . the search leads them to a shepherd's farm , but the farmer says that he hasn't seen anyone . [DAGMER] finds some walnut shells , so they know that [BRAN STARK] and [RICKON] were there , but the hounds can't get the scent . [THEON GREYJOY] tells them the hunt is over and to return maester [LUWIN] to [WINTERFELL] he knows where they are , and his [MERCY] has been exhausted . [THEON GREYJOY] has the burned bodies raised on the walls of [WINTERFELL] . [THEON GREYJOY] returns to [WINTERFELL] with [TWO] [CHILDREN] ['S] bodies burned [BEYOND] recognition , and he has them hoisted to either side of the main [GATE] . maester [LUWIN] cries out in grief when he sees them . at [HARRENHAL] , [TYWIN LANNISTER] is discussing the assassination of [AMORY LORCH] with ser [GREGOR CLEGANE] . [TYWIN LANNISTER] is convinced that it was an assassination attempt on himself , unaware that [JAQEN H] ['GHAR] actually killed [AMORY LORCH] on the request of [ARYA STARK] . ser [GREGOR CLEGANE] speculates that the [BROTHERHOOD WITHOUT BANNERS] [MAY] have been responsible . enraged , [TYWIN LANNISTER] orders [GREGOR CLEGANE] to burn out villages and farms in reprisal for this assassination attempt . [TYWIN LANNISTER] later suspects that [ARYA STARK] is highborn , because she doesn't pronounce m'lord the way commoners do , instead saying my lord , and possesses an educated vocabulary . [ARYA STARK] makes the excuse that her [MOTHER] , whom she said was a handmaiden for years to royalty , had taught her to speak properly like them . in king's [LANDING] , [SANSA STARK] comes to thank [SANDOR] the [HOUND] [GREGOR CLEGANE] for saving her life during the recent riot in the [CITY] and says that he was very brave . [SANDOR] simply says that a dog doesn't need courage to fight off rats . [SANSA STARK] is perturbed by his hateful speech , but [SANDOR] cautions that a day will [COME] when his penchant for violence is all that stands between her and her beloved king [JOFFREY BARATHEON] . [SANSA STARK] and [SHAE] trying to flip the mattress . [SANSA STARK] awakens in her bed from a nightmare , only to find the sheets covered in [BLOOD] she has begun menstruating for the [FIRST] time . given that [JOFFREY BARATHEON] openly promised to rape [SANSA STARK] to put a son in you as soon as she had her [BLOOD] , she then frantically tries to get rid of the bloody sheets to remove the evidence . [SHAE] tries to help [SANSA STARK] hide the sheets but [SANDOR] finds them . terrified of being brought to [JOFFREY BARATHEON] , [SANSA STARK] is instead brought before queen regent [CERSEI LANNISTER] , who awkwardly tries to comfort her . [CERSEI LANNISTER] presents [SANSA STARK] with warped advice on [JOFFREY BARATHEON] , bizarre counseling based on her bitter marriage with king [ROBERT BARATHEON] . blithely waving away her son's torment of [SANSA STARK] and homicidal outbursts she says that her brother [JAIME LANNISTER] stayed by her side the whole time she was giving birth to [JOFFREY BARATHEON] , but [SANSA STARK] should [NEVER] expect such devotion from [JOFFREY BARATHEON] . [CERSEI LANNISTER] firmly believes that [SANSA STARK] and [JOFFREY BARATHEON] not being in love is a good thing she advises [SANSA STARK] the more people you love , the weaker you are . [CERSEI LANNISTER] says that no one expects her to love [JOFFREY BARATHEON] , though she [MAY] take comfort in her love for the [CHILDREN] they will have . privately , [CERSEI LANNISTER] meets with [TYRION] and expresses regret at having [CHILDREN] with her own brother [JAIME LANNISTER] . she wonders if [JOFFREY BARATHEON] ['S] violent personality is the price of her and [JAIME LANNISTER] ['S] sins . [TYRION] earnestly points out that her other [TWO] [CHILDREN] , myrcella and [TOMMEN] , are not monsters , and they share an odd moment of sympathy . [TORRHEN KARSTARK] discovers the body of [ALTON LANNISTER] . at king [ROBB STARK] ['S] [ARMY] camp in the [WESTERLANDS] , close to an unidentified [KEEP] , [ALTON LANNISTER] returns as an envoy giving queen [CERSEI LANNISTER] ['S] response to [ROBB STARK] ['S] peace terms . [ROBB STARK] is unsurprised that she rejected them and imprisons [ALTON LANNISTER] with his cousin [JAIME LANNISTER] . the nurse [TALISA] maegyr discusses medical supplies she needs with [ROBB STARK] . [ROBB STARK] suggests she accompany him to the crag to acquire the supplies she needs . that [NIGHT] , [JAIME LANNISTER] kills [ALTON LANNISTER] to lure the guard , [TORRHEN KARSTARK] , into his cell . [JAIME LANNISTER] strangles [TORRHEN KARSTARK] and escapes , but is soon recaptured . [TORRHEN KARSTARK] was the son of lord [RICKARD KARSTARK] , one of the major nobles from the [NORTH] . lord [RICKARD KARSTARK] demands [JAIME LANNISTER] ['S] execution in revenge , regardless of his protected status as both a prisoner of war and a valuable political hostage . [CATELYN] is forced to argue for [JAIME LANNISTER] ['S] life . [CATELYN] confronts [JAIME LANNISTER] and tells him that he has no [HONOR] . [JAIME LANNISTER] bitterly explains that his vows as a [KNIGHT] required him to defend the innocent and serve the king , but his king was slaughtering the innocent . [JAIME LANNISTER] considers concepts like [HONOR] and loyalty na ve at best and hypocritical at worst . [JAIME LANNISTER] asserts that he has only been with [CERSEI LANNISTER] and begins to ridicule [EDDARD STARK] , [CATELYN] ['S] late husband , by bringing up the shame of [EDDARD STARK] fathering a bastard . this brings [CATELYN] to breaking point and she asks for [BRIENNE] ['S] sword . b

[JON SNOW] is still separated from the [KNIGHT] ['S] [WATCH] scouting group led by [QHORIN] [HALFHAND] . he attempts to locate them , traveling with his wildling prisoner [YGRITTE] . she argues with [JON SNOW] , criticizing him for ignoring their common descent from the [FIRST MEN] . she states that the animosity of the southerners to the [WILDLINGS] is arbitrary , given that the [WILDLINGS] are only distinguished from them by living [NORTH] of the [WALL] when it was constructed . she mocks [JON SNOW] ['S] sexual repression and surmises that he is a virgin . she taunts him by offering to teach him how to have sex . she escapes and leads him into an ambush . [YGRITTE] says that [JON SNOW] should have taken her when he had the chance . i

[DAENERYS TARGARYEN] is desperate to find her stolen [DRAGONS] . ser [JORAH MORMONT] returns and she orders him to find them . [XARO] xhoan daxos claims to be distressed at breaking his promise to protect her , fearing that his word will be publicly seen as worthless . [JORAH MORMONT] questions [QUAITHE] of asshai . [QUAITHE] knows that [JORAH MORMONT] once betrayed [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] by spying on her . [QUAITHE] warns [JORAH MORMONT] that the [MAN] who stole the [DRAGONS] is already with [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] . [JORAH MORMONT] finds [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] , in the company of kovarro , pleading with the [COUNCIL] of the [THIRTEEN] to find her [DRAGONS] . the warlock [PYAT PREE] confesses to stealing the [DRAGONS] and declares [XARO] the king of [QARTH] . doubles of the warlock then magically appear behind the other members of the [THIRTEEN] and slit their throats , leaving only [PYAT PREE] and [XARO] . [XARO] secretly entered into an alliance with [PYAT PREE] to become king . [PYAT PREE] urges [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] to find her [DRAGONS] at the [HOUSE] of the undying as the [THREE] flee .

[WEISS] and directed by [DAVID BENIOFF] nutter .

episode.location: [YGRITTE] brings [JON SNOW] before the lord of [BONES] , who orders him executed , because he has already captured [QHORIN] [HALFHAND] and doesn't need [TWO] crows for questioning . [YGRITTE] convinces him to spare [JON SNOW] because of his [EDDARD STARK] [BLOOD] . [QHORIN] initiates a plan to install [JON SNOW] as a spy within the wildling ranks . [GRENN] and [SAMWELL TARLY] discover a cache of dragonglass weapons at the [FIST] of the [FIRST MEN] . [JON SNOW] ['S] absence has been noted , but [SAM] refuses to believe that he is [DEAD] . a

ser [JORAH MORMONT] advises [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] to leave her [DRAGONS] and flee [QARTH] , as he has recently booked passage to [ASTAPOR] . she insists on attempting to reclaim them and asks ser [JORAH MORMONT] to lead her to the [HOUSE] of the undying , [MAN WITHOUT HONOR] knowing what lies in wait . . i

[THEON] gives [DAGMER] a pouch of gold to compensate for the killing of the orphans . [YARA] [GREYJOY] arrives at [WINTERFELL] with a [SMALL] band of [FIRST MEN] , but instead of bringing reinforcements she offers [THEON] only advice . [WINTERFELL] is too far from the [SEA] , they can't successfully defend it with so few soldiers , and the [NORTH] is rising against him . she implores [THEON] to abandon the [CASTLE] and return [HOME] with her , but he refuses to give up his prize . [DAGMER] tells [THEON] that after killing the orphans , he also murdered the farmer and his wife . [BRAN] overhears [LUWIN] and [OSHA] . [LUWIN] spots [OSHA] sneaking into the catacombs . he follows her inside , and she explains that after reaching the farm she doubled back , using a stream to mask their scent from the hounds . [LUWIN] urges her not to tell [BRAN] and [RICKON] about the [CHILDREN] [THEON] had murdered , but [BRAN] is sitting up behind a corner and listening to them . [STANNIS BARATHEON] ['S] fleet is closing in on king's [LANDING] . [STANNIS BARATHEON] tells [DAVOS] that he admires him and offers him the [HALFHAND] of the king role once he takes the [THRONE] . [TYRION LANNISTER] scours history books seeking inspiration for his plans to defend the [CITY] . he takes advice from bronn and [VARYS] and infers that he has decided to make use of the stocks of [WILDFIRE] . king [JOFFREY BARATHEON] is full of bravado , but his [MOTHER] is worried about letting him fight . she tries to ensure his safety by kidnapping the prostitute ros , believing that she is [TYRION LANNISTER] ['S] lover . [TYRION LANNISTER] is relieved that [SHAE] is safe but vows revenge against his sister . . [ARYA] gives [JAQEN] his own [NAME] . lord [TYWIN LANNISTER] is torn between needing to defend king's [LANDING] and wanting to drive king [ROBB STARK] from the [WESTERLANDS] . he decides to march west , leaving [ARYA STARK] at [HARRENHAL] to serve his castellan , ser [GREGOR CLEGANE] . realizing that she has missed her chance to [KILL] [TYWIN LANNISTER] , [ARYA STARK] pressures the assassin [JAQEN H] ['GHAR] into aiding her escape from [HARRENHAL] . she forces him to help her by giving him his own [NAME] as the third death he promised . she will only revoke his [NAME] when he agrees to break her and her friends out of the fortress . [ARYA STARK] , [HOT PIE] , and [GENDRY] [WALK] through the gates at midnight , as [JAQEN H] instructed . they escape [HARRENHAL] , realizing that the guards have been killed . [ROBB STARK] is furious when he learns that his [MOTHER] [CATELYN STARK] has freed his prized captive ser [JAIME LANNISTER] . he tells her that she has betrayed him and orders her kept under guard . [CATELYN STARK] has sent [BRIENNE] of [TARTH] to escort [JAIME LANNISTER] to king's [LANDING] to exchange him for her daughters , [SANSA] and [ARYA STARK] . [BRIENNE] uses a canoe to evade pursuit . [ROBB STARK] plans to relieve [WINTERFELL] by turning [JOFFREY BARATHEON] ['S] [FIRST MEN] against him with an offer of [MERCY] , issuing his orders to the bastard of the [DREADFORT] through [ROOSE BOLTON] . [ROBB STARK] seeks solace in the arms of lady [TALISA] maegyr , ignoring his betrothal to [HOUSE FREY] .

[WEISS] and directed by co executive producer alan taylor .
episode.plot: [JOFFREY BARATHEON] holds the fort [ARYA STARK] calls in her debt with [JAQEN H] [ROBB STARK] is betrayed [STANNIS BARATHEON] and [DAVOS] approach their destination . [BRAN] and [RICKON] [ROBB STARK] are revealed to be alive .

episode.location: bronn singing with the [JAIME LANNISTER] soldiers . [TYRION LANNISTER] leads the defense of king's [LANDING] against an assault by king [STANNIS BARATHEON] in the [BATTLE] of the [BLACKWATER] . he spends the [NIGHT] before the expected [SIEGE] in bed with [SHAE] , telling her she can still leave the [CITY] . [TYRION LANNISTER] has [VARYS] provide him with a map of the tunnel network beneath the [CITY] . [VARYS] tells [TYRION LANNISTER] that he is all that stands between them and defeat . bronn drinks with the [TYRION LANNISTER] [FIRST MEN] and has a confrontation with the [HOUND] , who is here [FIRST MEN] beginning to show the emotional and political fluctuations he will experience in the [COMING] [BATTLE] and which will shape his destiny for the rest of the series . [STANNIS BARATHEON] plans a naval assault aiming to overcome the [CITY] ['S] [SMALL] defensive fleet and land his troops at the walls of the [CITY] near the [MUD GATE] . . bronn fires the arrow that triggers the [WILDFIRE] explosion . from the battlements , [JOFFREY BARATHEON] berates [TYRION LANNISTER] , demanding to know why his ships are not meeting [STANNIS BARATHEON] ['S] fleet . [TYRION LANNISTER] has anticipated his strategy and does not field his fleet . instead he sends a single ship filled with [WILDFIRE] into the heart of [STANNIS BARATHEON] ['S] fleet , leaking the volatile substance over the surface of the [BLACKWATER] . bronn has been awaiting [TYRION LANNISTER] ['S] signal [OUTSIDE] the [CITY] on the shores of the [BAY] , and when [TYRION LANNISTER] tosses a torch from the battlements , bronn fires a flaming arrow triggering a massive , massive aquatic explosion . the ensuing conflagration devastates [STANNIS BARATHEON] ['S] fleet and destroys the ship of his [HIGH] captain , [DAVOS] seaworth , as well as killing [DAVOS] ['S] son , [MATTHOS] . [SANDOR] breaks down . [STANNIS BARATHEON] responds by putting his [FIRST MEN] ashore inside row boats , [LANDING] further from the walls to avoid the still burning inner [BAY] . with less protection for his troops he predicts that thousands will [DIE] . he leads the assault personally and is the [FIRST MEN] to reach the walls . [TYRION LANNISTER] orders [SANDOR CLEGANE] to lead a sortie [BEYOND] the [MUD GATE] to repel the attackers . [SANDOR CLEGANE] does as asked but is terrified by the [WILDFIRE] and breaks down emotionally . ser [LANCEL LANNISTER] accompanies him and is wounded by an arrow . bronn joins the fight in time to save the [HOUND] ['S] life . the [HOUND] retreats after losing half of his [FIRST MEN] and refuses to go out again . he demands wine and walks away from the [BATTLE] and his place in the [KINGSGUARD] , after saying in the presence of all , including the king , [FUCK] the [KINGS] guard . [FUCK] the [CITY] . [FUCK] the king . queen regent [CERSEI LANNISTER] offers protection to the ladies of the court in maegor's holdfast . she had earlier obtained essence of nightshade which is deadly unless taken in tiny amounts from [GRAND] maester [PYCELLE] and keeps the headsman ser [ILYN PAYNE] at her side at all times , preparing for the worst . she drinks wine heavily during the assault and seems , to simultaneously torment and [MOTHER] her captive , [SANSA STARK] , with a sort of cynical feminism involving dire descriptions of the rapes that will occur if the [CITY] falls . she also begins to question [SHAE] , who seems to her perhaps an unlikely handmaiden . when [LANCEL LANNISTER] comes to tell her that [STANNIS BARATHEON] has reached the walls [CERSEI LANNISTER] orders him to bring [JOFFREY BARATHEON] back to the [RED KEEP] , ignoring his protests that it would damage morale . [TYRION LANNISTER] rallies the troops . [JOFFREY BARATHEON] willingly leaves the defensive line with [LANCEL LANNISTER] and charges ser [MANDON MOORE] and ser boros blount of the [KINGSGUARD] to fight in the king's [NAME] . the gold cloaks' morale is [BROKEN] by his departure . [TYRION LANNISTER] steels himself to lead a sortie of his own . he rallies his [FIRST MEN] by telling them to fight for their [CITY] , their homes and their women , if not for their king and utters his famous line , those are brave [FIRST MEN] are knocking at our [DOOR] . let's go [KILL] them he leads his [FIRST MEN] through the tunnels beneath the [CITY] and is able to defeat [STANNIS BARATHEON] ['S] troops manning a battering ram at the [MUD GATE] . [TYRION LANNISTER] is betrayed by ser [MANDON MOORE] while fighting against a group of reinforcements . [MANDON MOORE] slashes [TYRION LANNISTER] across the face with his sword . before he can strike [TYRION LANNISTER] again , [TYRION LANNISTER] ['S] squire [PODRICK] [ILYN PAYNE] kills ser [MANDON MOORE] from behind with his spear . [TYRION LANNISTER] , barely conscious and held by [PODRICK] watches a [BATTLE] that seems lost . [LANCEL LANNISTER] wounded by arrow to shoulder . [LANCEL LANNISTER] returns to [CERSEI LANNISTER] to warn that they are defeated unless [JOFFREY BARATHEON] returns . when [LANCEL LANNISTER] tries to be firm with her , [CERSEI LANNISTER] ignores his counsel , pushes him out of the way deliberately causing him pain by hitting his injured side , and storms out . [SANSA STARK] tries to [RED KEEP] up the morale of the other women , frightened by [CERSEI LANNISTER] ['S] sudden departure . [SANSA STARK] leads them in singing a hymn . [CERSEI LANNISTER] has taken [TOMMEN] to the [THRONE] room . she sits with him on the [IRON THRONE] , and tells him a story about a young [LION] and how it did not need to fear other beasts of the [FOREST] , the [WOLF] and the stag . as she does this , she readies the poison for herself and for her son . [SHAE] tells [SANSA STARK] to go to her chambers , lock herself in , and await [STANNIS BARATHEON] , as he would not harm her , but ser [ILYN PAYNE] might . [SANSA STARK] finds the [HOUND] waiting in her room . he offers to take her [NORTH] to [WINTERFELL] , but she says she will be safe there when [STANNIS BARATHEON] takes the [IRON THRONE] . . [CERSEI LANNISTER] and [TOMMEN] on the [IRON THRONE] as the [BATTLE] rages . the [HOUND] scares [SANSA STARK] , but tells her to look at him , saying that since the world is made up of killers like [STANNIS BARATHEON] , her father , her brother [ROBB] , and he himself , she better get used to looking at them . though he promises to protect her , she is still too afraid of him to go with him . [CERSEI LANNISTER] sits on the [IRON THRONE] and prepares to poison [TOMMEN] in order to prevent him from being taken captive . [TYWIN] and [LORAS] lead their victorious forces into the [IRON THRONE] room . the forces of [TYWIN LANNISTER] and , it is revealed , his [NEW] allies in [HOUSE TYRELL] join the [BATTLE] . their cavalry charge is led by a warrior dressed in the armor of [RENLY] [STANNIS BARATHEON] and it decimates [STANNIS BARATHEON] ['S] [ARMY] . the survivors flee to their ships . [STANNIS BARATHEON] is dragged from the [BATTLE] by his guards , screaming for his [TOMMEN] to stand and fight . [TYRION LANNISTER] collapses into unconsciousness as the [BATTLE] turns in the [CROWN] ['S] favor . [TYWIN LANNISTER] bursts into the [IRON THRONE] room and announces their victory , just in time to stop [CERSEI LANNISTER] from killing [TOMMEN] . ser [LORAS] [HOUSE TYRELL] reveals himself as the [KNIGHT] wearing [RENLY] ['S] armor .
episode.info: [BLACKWATER] is the ninth [EPISODE] of the [SECOND] [SEASON] of [GAME OF THRONES] . it is the nineteenth [EPISODE] of the series overall . it premiered on [MAY] 27 , 2012. it was written by co executive producer and writer of the novels george r.r . martin and directed by neil marshall .
episode.plot: a massive [BATTLE] rages for control of king's [LANDING] and the [IRON THRONE] .

episode.location: [TYRION LANNISTER] convalesces from the wound he suffered during the [BATTLE] of the [BLACKWATER] at the hands of ser [MANDON MOORE] . he is informed by a gloating [GRAND] maester [PYCELLE] that he is no longer acting [HAND] of the king , as his father [TYWIN LANNISTER] has returned to the [CITY] and will take over his duties as [HAND] . [VARYS] visits and tells him that bronn has been relieved of his command of the gold cloaks and his hill tribesmen have gone [HOME] with their plunder [TYRION LANNISTER] has lost all of his power . [VARYS] thanks [TYRION LANNISTER] for his part in defending the [CITY] , noting that no one else will do so . [SHAE] urges [TYRION LANNISTER] to leave with her for [PENTOS] , but he refuses . king [JOFFREY BARATHEON] rewards those who served him well in the [BATTLE] . lord [TYWIN LANNISTER] is officially named [HAND] of the king and savior of the [CITY] . [LITTLEFINGER] is awarded [HARRENHAL] for brokering the alliance between [HOUSES] [TYWIN LANNISTER] and [HOUSE TYRELL] . [LORAS] [HOUSE TYRELL] asks that [JOFFREY BARATHEON] wed his sister [MARGAERY] to unite their [HOUSES] . queen [CERSEI LANNISTER] and [PYCELLE] make a show of convincing [JOFFREY BARATHEON] to set aside his betrothal to [SANSA STARK] , given the treachery of [HOUSE STARK] . [JOFFREY BARATHEON] plays along and agrees to wed [MARGAERY] . in private , [SANSA STARK] is overjoyed to be [FREE] , until [LITTLEFINGER] points out that it will not stop [JOFFREY BARATHEON] from tormenting her however , he does assure her that he will help her escape , for the sake of her [MOTHER] . [JAIME] recognized by [SANSA STARK] [TOMMEN] . following his defeat at the [BLACKWATER] , [STANNIS BARATHEON] has retreated back to [DRAGONSTONE] . he rages at [MELISANDRE] for not foreseeing his defeat , despite her claims to see the future . [MELISANDRE] insists that the lord of [LIGHT] only allows her glimpses and that [STANNIS BARATHEON] can not abandon the war because of a single defeat . [STANNIS BARATHEON] accuses her of lying to him , of knowing nothing about war and angrily begins to strangle her . when [MELISANDRE] insists her [GOD] is in him , [STANNIS BARATHEON] releases her , realizing she is talking about the creature they created to murder his brother . [MELISANDRE] tells [STANNIS BARATHEON] he will betray his [TOMMEN] , his family and his beliefs but in the [END] , it will be worth it she assures [STANNIS BARATHEON] that he is the lord's chosen and he will be king . [STANNIS BARATHEON] is skeptical , but [MELISANDRE] has him look into a brazier [STANNIS BARATHEON] appears to have visions , restoring his [FAITH] in the [RED PRIESTESS] . in the [WESTERLANDS] , king [ROBB STARK] speaks with his [MOTHER] lady [CATELYN] regarding his love affair with the [WOMAN] [TALISA] . [CATELYN] urges [ROBB STARK] to remember his vow to wed a daughter of [HOUSE FREY] , or face severe consequences . she says that she and [ROBB STARK] ['S] father didn't love each other when they [FIRST] married , but that he grew to love her over time . she predicts that [ROBB STARK] and his betrothed might build a similar love over time . [ROBB STARK] disregards her advice and marries [TALISA] in private that [KNIGHT] . traveling east to king's [LANDING] , [BRIENNE] of [TARTH] and [JAIME LANNISTER] [COME] upon the bodies of [THREE] women , hanged by [ROBB STARK] soldiers for having slept with [JAIME LANNISTER] soldiers . when the [TOMMEN] return , the pair try to lie their way out of the situation . [JAIME LANNISTER] is recognized and [BRIENNE] chose to [KILL] the soldiers . in so doing she reveals her prowess as a fighter to [JAIME LANNISTER] . when [JAIME LANNISTER] reminds her that she killed [ROBB STARK] [TOMMEN] , [BRIENNE] responds that she does not serve [HOUSE STARK] , but [CATELYN STARK] . in [WINTERFELL] , [THEON GREYJOY] is besieged by a [NORTHERN] [ARMY] under command of [ROOSE BOLTON] ['S] bastard son . maester [LUWIN] tells [THEON GREYJOY] his chances of holding the [CASTLE] with only twenty [TOMMEN] are negligible . [LUWIN] suggests that [THEON GREYJOY] join the [KNIGHT] ['S] [WATCH] , gaining a chance to redeem himself . when [THEON GREYJOY] refuses fearing that [JON SNOW] will [KILL] him for his betrayal and tries to rally his [TOMMEN] for [BATTLE] , they betray him [DAGMER] knocks [THEON GREYJOY] out . when [LUWIN] tries to intervene , [DAGMER] stabs him with a spear . the ironmen place a bag on [THEON GREYJOY] and depart [WINTERFELL] to deliver him to the [ROOSE BOLTON] [ARMY] . some time later , [BRAN] , [RICKON] , [OSHA] and [HODOR] emerge from their hiding place in [WINTERFELL] ['S] crypts and find the [CASTLE] burning . they discover the dying [LUWIN] in the godswood . he insists that the boys must go [NORTH] to the [WALL] , as there are too many enemies in the [SOUTH] and [JON SNOW] will be able to [KEEP] them safe and tell their [MOTHER] of their survival . [LUWIN] affirms his pride at having served the [STARKS] before asking [OSHA] to give him a quick death . traveling away from [HARRENHAL] , [ARYA] , [GENDRY] and [HOT PIE] cross paths with [JAQEN H] ['GHAR] , who has been waiting for them . he offers to take [ARYA] with him to [BRAAVOS] , where she can learn his skills of killing and find a way to [KILL] those on her list . she declines , wanting to be reunited with her family . [JAQEN H] gives her an [IRON] coin and the [WORDS] [VALAR MORGHULIS] , telling her to speak them to any [WOMAN] from [BRAAVOS] should she ever need to find him again . [JAQEN H] bids [ARYA] farewell , using her real [NAME] , and departs , changing his face to that of a different [WOMAN] as he leaves . a

[DAENERYS] in her vision of the [IRON THRONE] room . [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] arrives at [HOUSE STARK] of the undying and is magically separated from [JORAH] and kovarro . she finds herself in an empty circular room with many doors . she chooses one and opens it . she is presented with tempting visions . [FIRST] the snowy , ruined [IRON THRONE] room of king's [LANDING] where she turns away from the [IRON THRONE] . she then walks through the gates of the [WALL] surrounded by more [JON SNOW] , and into [DROGO] ['S] tent . she finds [DROGO] and what would have been her infant son [RHAEGO] . they talk about whose dream they are in , and [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] silently leaves after touching [RHAEGO] ['S] hair . she returns to the room with many doors and finds her [DRAGONS] chained to a pedestal in front of her . [PYAT PREE] appears and explains that she and her brood are the source of his restored magic . [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] is also chained by [PYAT PREE] ['S] magic . the young queen is unconcerned however , and simply regards [PYAT PREE] with a cool , almost lazy gaze . she calmly utters a single word dracarys after a couple of tries , all [THREE] [DRAGONS] unleash their fiery breath , and [PYAT PREE] is incinerated . [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] knows that [XARO] has betrayed her . she returns to his palace to confront him and finds [DOREAH] in bed with him . she takes his key and uses it to open his [VALYRIAN] [STONE] vault . she is surprised when it is empty , but observes that this proves something can easily [COME] from nothing . on her orders , [DOREAH] and [XARO] are locked into the empty vault to [DIE] , their pleas cut off by the closing [DOOR] . [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] salvages enough from [XARO] ['S] household to buy a ship . on [JORAH] ['S] orders , the [DOTHRAKI] seize [XARO] ['S] gold and jewels while [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] triumphantly watches with her [THREE] [DRAGONS] . b

the king [BEYOND] the [WALL] ['S] camp . [JON SNOW] and [QHORIN] [HALFHAND] are marched towards the camp of the king [BEYOND] the [WALL] , [MANCE RAYDER] , as captives of the lord of [BONES] . [QHORIN] realizes that he will have to sacrifice himself in order to facilitate the ruse of [JON SNOW] deserting to the [WILDLINGS] , so he stuns one of his captors and acquires a sword , attacking [JON SNOW] with the seeming intention of killing him for treachery . the lord of [BONES] lets them fight , and [YGRITTE] gives [JON SNOW] back his sword . [QHORIN] enrages [JON SNOW] by insulting his parentage . after a fierce duel , [JON SNOW] mortally wounds [QHORIN] per [QHORIN] ['S] own instructions , who whispers to [JON SNOW] we are the [WATCHERS] on the [WALL] before he breathes his last , signalling to him that he has done the right thing and reminding [JON SNOW] that he must find out all he can about the [WILDLINGS]' plans and get back to the [WALL] . by killing [QHORIN] , the [WILDLINGS] believe [JON SNOW] has betrayed his oath and release him . impressed , the lord of [BONES] cuts [JON SNOW] [FREE] . [YGRITTE] shows him their vast [ARMY] , gathering in a valley below . she promises to take him to their king and , with no other choice , [JON SNOW] follows her . at the [FIST] of the [FIRST MEN] , [SAM] , [GRENN] and edd are foraging for fuel when they hear [THREE] horn blasts the warning call for [WHITE WALKERS] . the [THREE] run back to the [FIST] . [SAM] is left behind , caught in a sudden blizzard . seeing shadowy figures moving through the blowing [JON SNOW] , [SAM] hides behind a [ROCK] and watches as dozens of wights [WALK] past him , led by a [WHITE WALKER] riding an undead horse wight . [SAM] cowers in fear , but the [WHITE WALKER] seemingly ignores him . raising a spear with a blade of [ICE] , the creature gives a piercing shriek , and the [ARMY] of wights and [WHITE WALKERS] , numbering several hundred , advances on the [FIST] .
episode.info: [VALAR MORGHULIS] is the tenth and final [EPISODE] of the [SECOND] [SEASON] of [GAME OF THRONES] . it is the twentieth [EPISODE] of the series overall . it premiered on june 3 , 2012. it was written by executive producers [DAVID BENIOFF] [D.B] . [WEISS] and directed by co executive producer alan taylor .
episode.plot: [TYRION] awakens to a changed situation . king [JOFFREY] doles out rewards to his subjects . as [THEON] stirs his [FIRST MEN] to action , [LUWIN] offers some final advice . [BRIENNE] silences [JAIME] [ARYA] receives a [GIFT] from [JAQEN] [DANY] goes to a strange place [JON SNOW] proves himself to [QHORIN] .

episode.location: [GHOST] attacks a wight . in a [PROLOGUE] scene , shouts and sword clashes are heard in the darkness as the [WHITE WALKERS] and their [ARMY] of undead wights attack the [FIRST MEN] of the [NIGHT] ['S] [WATCH] off screen in the [BATTLE] of the [FIST] of the [FIRST MEN] . [SAMWELL TARLY] is then seen alive , wandering through a blizzard in search of safety . he sees another [MAN] of the [NIGHT] ['S] [WATCH] up ahead but soon finds that he has been decapitated and his head placed in his own hands . just then , a wight approaches [SAM] and is about to attack him with an axe when the direwolf [GHOST] knocks it down . [GHOST] continues to tear at its legs as it pulls itself forward inch by inch towards [SAM] . the wight suddenly burst into flame , destroyed by a torch wielded by lord commander [JEOR MORMONT] , killing it . [JEOR MORMONT] has managed to rally the few dozen survivors out of his original [THREE] hundred [FIRST MEN] at the [FIST] of the [FIRST MEN] . [JEOR MORMONT] is angry that [SAM] wasn't able to send off any messenger ravens in the confusion of the attack . [JEOR MORMONT] announces that they must retreat back to the [WALL] , not simply to save their own lives but because [CASTLE BLACK] and the rest of [WESTEROS] must be warned of the [COMING] threat otherwise everyone they've ever known will [DIE] . meanwhile , [JON SNOW] is led by [YGRITTE] and the lord of [BONES] into the main wildling camp in the frostfangs mountains . it is not simply an [ARMY] camp almost all of wildling society is on the move to escape the [WHITE WALKERS] , including women and [CHILDREN] . as they enter the camp , [JON SNOW] is shocked to see a real life giant [WALK] past . many of the [WILDLINGS] are surprised to see [JON SNOW] in his all [CASTLE BLACK] [NIGHT] ['S] [WATCH] clothing and shout crow at his approach . several young boys pelt [JON SNOW] with [ICE] and [SMALL] stones , but [YGRITTE] shoos them away . giant carrying mammoth [BONES] . [JON SNOW] is led into the tent of king [BEYOND] the [WALL] [MANCE RAYDER] , where the lord of [BONES] explains that he is [NED STARK] ['S] bastard son to a large [MAN] with a heavy beard who is eating chicken by the [FIRE] . he says that he doesn't care , but his interest is piqued on hearing that [JON SNOW] killed [QHORIN] [HALFHAND] . as they talk , [JON SNOW] kneels before the [MAN] , whom he assumes to be [MANCE RAYDER] , and calls him your grace as he would a king [SOUTH] of the [WALL] . all the [WILDLINGS] to burst into laughter their society does not bother with such ceremony and because the [MAN] actually isn't [MANCE RAYDER] , but his lieutenant [TORMUND] giantsbane . [MANCE RAYDER] himself is an unassuming [MAN] sitting in a corner , who then introduces himself and tells [JON SNOW] to stand , as no [MAN] kneels before another among the [FREE FOLK] , as they do not recognize a class of nobility in their culture . [MANCE RAYDER] says he is glad that [JON SNOW] killed [QHORIN] , as he had killed many of [MANCE RAYDER] ['S] [WILDLINGS] , though he notes that [QHORIN] was his brother once , back when he was a member of the [NIGHT] ['S] [WATCH] and [QHORIN] had a whole [HALFHAND] . [MANCE RAYDER] asks [JON SNOW] why he wants to join them . he replies that he wants to be [FREE FOLK] , but [MANCE RAYDER] thinks he just wants to be a hero . [JON SNOW] then explains that when the [NIGHT] ['S] [WATCH] camped at [CRASTER] ['S] [KEEP] , he saw [CRASTER] leave his newborn son in the woods as an offering , and the inhuman creature that took it . [JON SNOW] says that he wants to leave the [NIGHT] ['S] [WATCH] because he is disgusted that [JEOR MORMONT] already knew what [CRASTER] was doing but did nothing to stop it . [JON SNOW] states that the [FIRST MEN] he is descended from defeated the [WHITE WALKERS] once during the [LONG] [NIGHT] , and that now he wants to fight for the side who fights for the living . [MANCE RAYDER] is satisfied and advises [JON SNOW] to get a [NEW] cloak . i

bronn confronts [TWO] [KINGSGUARD] . in king's [LANDING] , king [JOFFREY BARATHEON] ['S] forces stand victorious after the [BATTLE] of the [BLACKWATER] . [HOUSE LANNISTER] ['S] [NEW] allies [HOUSE TYRELL] begin to settle into the capital . [TYWIN LANNISTER] bluntly tells his son [TYRION] that he intends to disinherit him . this comes as a shock , because his older brother [JAIME] gave up all right to inherit his father's [LANDS] when he joined the [KINGSGUARD] , and [TYRION] is rightfully the next in line of succession . for that matter , despite all evidence to the contrary , [TYWIN LANNISTER] refuses to believe that [TYRION] was in any way helpful in the defense of the [CITY] or during his months as acting [HALFHAND] of the king . instead , [TYWIN LANNISTER] obstinately maintains his belief that [TYRION] is a whore mongering , drunken , ill made , spiteful little creature , and that he is lying about all of his accomplishments out of envy . [TYWIN LANNISTER] is particularly insulted that [TYRION] brought his mistress , [SHAE] , to the capital when [TYWIN LANNISTER] explicitly told him not to , which makes [TYWIN LANNISTER] convince himself that [TYRION] was in bed with [SHAE] most of the time while events spiraled out of control . when [TYRION] asks why his father is doing this , [TYWIN LANNISTER] is shocked as if [TYRION] insulted him , and says it should be obvious as [TYRION] killed his [MOTHER] joanna in childbirth so that he might enter the world . [TYWIN LANNISTER] says that the [LAWS] of [FIRST MEN] say he has to let [TYRION] use his family [NAME] , but that he wishes he could prove [TYRION] wasn't his son , so his very existence would not continue to make a mockery out of the [NAME] [TYWIN LANNISTER] which he stole from [TYWIN LANNISTER] . [TYRION] fumes at the situation to his sellsword bronn , who has recently been knighted as a reward for his service in the [BATTLE] of the [BLACKWATER] . he now styles himself as ser bronn of the [BLACKWATER] , and while possessing no [LANDS] , wealth , or title , this drastically elevates his social standing and in his mind , his pay . meanwhile , [JOFFREY BARATHEON] ['S] ride back from the [GREAT SEPT] of [BAELOR] in a heavily guarded palanquin is interrupted when his betrothed , lady [MARGAERY TYRELL] , stops the procession in [FLEA BOTTOM] unexpectedly . [MARGAERY TYRELL] shocks the guards and bewilders [JOFFREY BARATHEON] by getting out and exploring , eventually arriving at an orphanage and interacting with the [CHILDREN] . meanwhile , her servants pass out bread and toys , earning her the love of [FLEA BOTTOM] ['S] smallfolk . that evening , [JOFFREY BARATHEON] and [CERSEI] visit [MARGAERY TYRELL] and her brother [LORAS] [MARGAERY TYRELL] for a [SMALL] dinner party . [CERSEI] admonishes [MARGAERY TYRELL] ['S] boldness and reminds her that her impromptu charity work took place on the same streets where the royal party was assaulted weeks earlier . when [JOFFREY BARATHEON] naively defends [MARGAERY TYRELL] and criticizes his [MOTHER] , [CERSEI] realizes that she is on the verge of being outmaneuvered . [CERSEI] only knows how to rule through fear , but [MARGAERY TYRELL] knows how to [TYWIN LANNISTER] the love of the people she rules over , a skill [CERSEI] lacks . [SANSA STARK] and [SHAE] sit on the docks watching ships arrive and depart . [SANSA STARK] wants to play a [GAME] making up stories about where the ships are headed , but [SHAE] , in typical fashion , is uninterested . [PETYR] [BAELISH] arrives to speak with [SANSA STARK] . she displays an eagerness to leave as soon as possible . he suggests that when he next leaves the capital by [SEA] , she might be able to stow away . [SANSA STARK] advises him not to give her too many details since she is a terrible liar . meanwhile , ros , who seems to be acting as [LITTLEFINGER] ['S] aide , reminisces about the day [SANSA STARK] was born , when all the bells in [WINTERFELL] were rung in celebration . she asks [SHAE] to look out for [SANSA STARK] , particularly in regards to [LITTLEFINGER] . on [DRAGONSTONE] , king [STANNIS BARATHEON] ['S] shattered forces regroup after being almost totally destroyed in the [BATTLE] of the [BLACKWATER] . [DAVOS] seaworth is rescued from the [SEA] by [SALLADHOR] saan after being thrown overboard by the [WILDFIRE] blast in the [BATTLE] . forlorn over the death of his son [MATTHOS] , [DAVOS] feels that [MELISANDRE] has led [STANNIS BARATHEON] to disaster , and is horrified to hear from [SALLADHOR] that she has begun to conduct human sacrifices . after the defeated remnant of [STANNIS BARATHEON]' forces returned to the [ISLAND] , [MELISANDRE] ordered any who spoke out against her to be burned alive as offerings to the lord of [LIGHT] . [DAVOS] convinces [SALLADHOR] to bring him to [DRAGONSTONE] . he finds [STANNIS BARATHEON] despondent , sitting in the chamber of the painted table alone with [MELISANDRE] . [DAVOS] openly calls [MELISANDRE] his enemy , condemns her for conducting human sacrifices , and says she is leading [STANNIS BARATHEON] astray . she counters that it was [DAVOS] who urged [STANNIS BARATHEON] not to bring her to the [BATTLE] , and implies that it was actually [DAVOS]' fault that thousands of their [FIRST MEN] burned to death , including his own son . at the mention of his son [DAVOS] draws a knife on her in a fit of anger , but he is restrained by the guards , and [STANNIS BARATHEON] orders him put in the dungeon . [DAVOS] tries to [KILL] [MELISANDRE] . in the [RIVERLANDS] , the morale of king [ROBB STARK] ['S] [ARMY] is starting to wane . they have not had a significant victory since the [BATTLE] of [OXCROSS] months ago , and the news of the [LANNISTERS]' victory over [STANNIS BARATHEON] and [NEW] alliance with the [TYRELLS] piles bad news upon bad news . [ROBB STARK] has won every [BATTLE] he has ever fought , but the [LANNISTERS] finally realized it was too difficult to try to attack him head on , so they have shifted to the [NEW] strategy of simply fleeing ahead of [ROBB STARK] ['S] [ARMY] . [ROBB STARK] ['S] forces have won many [SMALL] but also insignificant minor victories , as the [LANNISTERS] are now determined to simply wait [ROBB STARK] out and exhaust his [ARMY] far from [HOME] while they slowly rebuild their own numbers and gain [NEW] allies . in frustration , [ROBB STARK] launches a [NEW] offensive to the east which takes the [GREAT] [CASTLE] of [HARRENHAL] , which [TYWIN LANNISTER] had been using it as the main [TYWIN LANNISTER] forward base in the [RIVERLANDS] during the [FIRST MEN] year of the war . however , [ROBB STARK] does not find the decisive victory he was hoping for [TYWIN LANNISTER] withdrew his garrison to king's [LANDING] to counter the attack by [STANNIS BARATHEON] , and didn't even bother wasting any [FIRST MEN] on a token defense of the [CASTLE] . [ROBB STARK] and his forces are further demoralized to find that the [LANNISTERS] massacred [TWO] hundred [NORTHERN] and [RIVERLANDS] prisoners of war before they left , and the courtyards are choked with piles of bodies . they do find one survivor , a maester named [QYBURN] . a

[DROGON] roasts a fish . [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] ['S] ship arrives at the [CITY] of [ASTAPOR] in [SLAVER] ['S] [BAY] after leaving [QARTH] . [DAENERYS TARGARYEN]' [DRAGONS] are continuing to grow , and are now about the size of [SMALL] dogs . they fly about their ship as it approaches the [CITY] , plucking fish from the [SEA] and roasting them in mid air with their [WILDFIRE] breath.she notes that they are still not big enough to use as weapons of war to invade [WESTEROS] with , and that she needs an [ARMY] . ser [JORAH MORMONT] notes that the elite warrior eunuchs produced in [ASTAPOR] , known as the [UNSULLIED] , are said to be among the finest soldiers in the world . [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] stresses that they are slave soldiers , a distinction which [MAY] make some look on her negatively in [WESTEROS] where slavery is illegal , but [JORAH MORMONT] says they have no better ideas for how to acquire an [ARMY] . [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] expresses interest in expanding her tiny [DOTHRAKI] [KHALASAR] most of them are seasick because the [DOTHRAKI] have [NEVER] traveled on ships before , but [JORAH MORMONT] says that other [DOTHRAKI] will only join her if they think she is strong , and for that she needs an [ARMY] . upon arriving at [ASTAPOR] , [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] is given a tour of the [UNSULLIED] barracks by the [UNSULLIED] ['S] owner , [KRAZNYS] mo nakloz , with his slave girl [MISSANDEI] translating his low [VALYRIAN] into the common tongue of [WESTEROS] for [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] . they explain that the [UNSULLIED] are trained for [BATTLE] from the age of [FIVE] , and that only one in four recruits survives the training . [KRAZNYS] also demonstrates that the [UNSULLIED] do not fear pain or death by slicing off the nipple of one soldier much to [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] ['S] disgust , who not only shows no sign of pain , but thanks the slavemaster for the opportunity to serve him . [KRAZNYS] goes on to explain that the [UNSULLIED] are trained to show no [MERCY] or weakness by killing a newborn slave child in front of its [MOTHER] at the [END] of their training . [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] is outraged by this , but still asks how many [UNSULLIED] are available . she is told there are eight thousand soldiers for sale and that she has until the next day to make a decision . en route back to their ship , ser [JORAH MORMONT] urges that [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] should purchase the [UNSULLIED] , arguing that under her command , these slave soldiers will have a far better quality of life serving her than they would under [KRAZNYS] and his ilk . [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] is distracted by a playing child following her and [JORAH MORMONT] , and neither notice a [MAN] in a hooded [BLACK] cloak following them , armed with a dagger . . [BARRISTAN] saves [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] from a deadly manticore . the child offers a [GIFT] to [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] a wooden ball but as she picks it up , the hooded [STRANGER] knocks it out of her hands ser [JORAH MORMONT] grabs the [STRANGER] and their struggle knocks [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] to the ground , where to her horror , the ball cracks in half and a manticore emerges to attack . before the creature can harm [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] with its lethal sting , the [STRANGER] impales it with his dagger and charges at the child , who hisses in a reptilian manner , baring teeth and features reminiscent of [PYAT PREE] , and uses magic to escape . [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] realizes the assassin was likely an agent of the surviving warlocks of [QARTH] . turning her attention to her savior , [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] is surprised when the [MAN] addresses her as his queen and removes his hood . she asks if [JORAH MORMONT] knows the [MAN] . a stunned [JORAH MORMONT] admits he does the [STRANGER] before them is one of the most skilled fighters in [WESTEROS] ser [BARRISTAN SELMY] , lord commander of [ROBERT BARATHEON] ['S] [KINGSGUARD] . falling to his knees , ser [BARRISTAN SELMY] explains that following [ROBERT BARATHEON] ['S] death and his dismissal by [JOFFREY] , he has been searching for [DAENERYS TARGARYEN] stormborn , to beg her forgiveness and offer his service , hoping to make amends for failing [HOUSE TARGARYEN] during and after [ROBERT BARATHEON] ['S] [REBELLION] , when he served in her father's [KINGSGUARD] . [BARRISTAN SELMY] hails her as the rightful queen and asks to serve in her queensguard .
episode.info: [VALAR DOHAERIS] is the [FIRST] [EPISODE] of the third [SEASON] of [GAME OF THRONES] . it is the twenty [FIRST] [EPISODE] of the series overall .
episode.plot: [JON] is brought before [MANCE RAYDER] , the king [BEYOND] the [WALL] , while the [NIGHT] ['S] [WATCH] survivors retreat [SOUTH] . in king's [LANDING] , [TYRION] asks for his reward , [LITTLEFINGER] offers [SANSA] a way out , and [CERSEI] hosts a dinner for the royal family . [DANY] sails into [SLAVER] ['S] [BAY] .

episode.location: [JON SNOW] marches slowly [SOUTH] with the [FREE FOLK] [ARMY] of king [BEYOND] the [WALL] [MANCE RAYDER] . [MANCE RAYDER] explains that his [ARMY] is a diverse force , formed of about ninety different groups or clans of [WILDLINGS] , who speak [SEVEN] different languages , and have numerous internal rivalries . however , he managed to unite them all by telling them the truth that they will all [DIE] if they remain [NORTH] of the [WALL] . [MANCE RAYDER] brings [JON SNOW] to one of his scouts , [ORELL] . he is sitting silently with his eyes rolled back as an eagle circles above him . [MANCE RAYDER] says that he is a warg , and [YGRITTE] is surprised that [JON SNOW] doesn't know what that is . [MANCE RAYDER] explains that a warg is a person who is capable of entering the mind of an animal , seeing what it sees and even controlling its actions . [ORELL] controls his menagerie to scout miles ahead . [MANCE RAYDER] asks him what he has seen , and [ORELL] says he saw the [FIST] of the [FIRST MEN] and many [DEAD] crows . [JORAH MORMONT] assigns [RAST] care of [TARLY] . lord commander [JEOR MORMONT] of the [NIGHT] ['S] [WATCH] leads the few survivors of the slaughter at the [BATTLE] of the [FIST] of the [FIRST MEN] [SOUTH] in hope of reaching the [WALL] . [SAMWELL TARLY] is exhausted and collapses . [RAST] is annoyed that [SAM] hid during the [BATTLE] , and thinks they should leave him because he's slowing them down . [SAM] is upset that [GRENN] and edd abandoned him at the start of the attack , although they refuse to leave him now . [JEOR MORMONT] tells [SAM] that he has to [KEEP] moving , and sternly forbids [SAM] to [DIE] . [JEOR MORMONT] orders [RAST] to [KEEP] [SAM] alive until they reach the [WALL] on pain of death . i

[BRAN STARK] dreams that he is walking and hunting in the woods he sees the mysterious [THREE EYED RAVEN] again . as he aims his bow , he relives his memories of when he was practicing archery with [JON SNOW] and [ROBB] , and hears the voice of his father [EDDARD] . [BRAN STARK] shoots at the [THREE EYED RAVEN] but misses . a young [STRANGER] appears . the [BOY] tells [BRAN STARK] that he can not shoot the [THREE EYED RAVEN] , because he is the [THREE EYED RAVEN] . [BRAN STARK] awakens suddenly , worrying [HODOR] for a moment but he says that he is fine . [OSHA] says they have enough problems [WITHOUT] [DARK] dreams . [BRAN STARK] , [RICKON] , [OSHA] , [HODOR] , and the direwolves [SUMMER] and [SHAGGYDOG] continue to head [NORTH] from [WINTERFELL] to the [WALL] . later , the same [BOY] from the dream approaches their camp in the woods unarmed . [SUMMER] snarls at him initially but then sniffs his [HAND] and turns away . [OSHA] comes up behind the [BOY] with a sharpened wooden spear , only for the [BOY] ['S] sister to surprise [OSHA] and put a knife to her throat . the [BOY] introduces himself as [JOJEN] [REED] , and his sister as [MEERA] [REED] . [HOUSE REED] are loyal bannermen of [HOUSE STARK] , and they have been searching for [BRAN STARK] and [RICKON] so that they can protect them . when they are on the move again , [JOJEN] and [BRAN STARK] discuss his [WOLF] dreams . [JOJEN] explains that [BRAN STARK] himself is a warg . [JOJEN] says that it starts out as vivid dreams seeing the world through his [WOLF] ['S] eyes , but with practice he will be able to consciously enter the mind of his [WOLF] and control its actions . [BRAN STARK] asks if prophetic dreams are part of being a warg , but [JOJEN] explains that's a different , related ability . the [SIGHT] allows those who possess it to see events that haven't happened yet , or events that happened [LONG] before they were born , or events happening now but thousands of miles away . [JOJEN] confirms that [BRAN STARK] ['S] dream of his father [EDDARD] the day he died was an example of the [SIGHT] , and that [JOJEN] himself had a similar dream the same day . he says that when he told his father , lord [HOWLAND] [HOUSE REED] , he openly wept , for he correctly realized that his son's dream signified that [EDDARD] was [DEAD] . [BRAN STARK] says that [HOWLAND] was a [GREAT] friend of his father [EDDARD] ['S] who fought alongside him during [ROBERT] ['S] [REBELLION] . [JOJEN] says that [HOWLAND] doesn't like to talk about the war much . [JOJEN] confirms that [BRAN STARK] wasn't simply experiencing a vision of [JOJEN] in his earlier dream , but that he reached out with his mind to contact [BRAN STARK] in his dream , and that he [REMEMBERS] seeing the [THREE EYED RAVEN] too . at an indeterminate location , [THEON GREYJOY] has been chained up in a dungeon after being knocked out before the [SACK] of [WINTERFELL] . [MEN] [COME] in , some wearing [IRONBORN] clothing , and interrogate him . when he asks what they want , one of his captors says he wants to do this and starts prying his fingernails off with a knife . later they use a foot press to torture him , while also slowly turning a screw into his foot until it is bleeding freely , repeatedly asking him why he captured [WINTERFELL] , but apparently not caring about the answers he gives . [THEON GREYJOY] at [FIRST] tells them the simple truth that he wanted to take and [HOLD] [WINTERFELL] while the [NORTH] was vunerable to impress his father , then starts frantically lying , saying he hates the [STARKS] and is their enemy , desperately trying to figure out what his captors want him to tell them . when the guards leave they put a bag over his head . a servant [BOY] comes over to [THEON GREYJOY] and unwinds the foot press , and tells him that he has been sent by his sister [YARA] to rescue him . however , he must wait until nightfall when the [CASTLE] is asleep , so he puts the bag back on and the desperate [THEON GREYJOY] is left alone crying for help . king [JOFFREY BARATHEON] is being fitted for [NEW] clothes in his chambers , in preparation for his upcoming [WEDDING] to [MARGAERY TYRELL] . his [MOTHER] [CERSEI] begins to criticize [MARGAERY TYRELL] , saying that she is only charitable to the poor to build up support for herself , and also saying that she thinks she dresses like a harlot . however , [JOFFREY BARATHEON] barely tolerates his [MOTHER] ['S] chiding and dismissively tells her off . [SHAE] dresses [SANSA STARK] in her chambers , and warns [SANSA STARK] about [PETYR] [LITTLEFINGER] [BAELISH] . she points out that [BAELISH] has offered to help [SANSA STARK] for nothing in return , which probably means that he's after something . [SANSA STARK] naively says that he's an [HOLD] friend of her [MOTHER] ['S] , believing that should be reason enough . [SHAE] suggests that [BAELISH] is actually sexually attracted to [SANSA STARK] . this disturbs [SANSA STARK] , but she thinks it is simply impossible , as [BAELISH] is so much older than her . [SHAE] continues to warn [SANSA STARK] that [BAELISH] is manipulative and [MEN] usually only want one thing from pretty young ladies , and love often isn't what they're after . [SANSA STARK] warns the [TYRELLS] that [JOFFREY BARATHEON] is a monster . ser [LORAS] [MARGAERY TYRELL] arrives at the [DOOR] and escorts [SANSA STARK] to the [GARDENS] to meet with [MARGAERY TYRELL] and their grandmother , lady [OLENNA TYRELL] . [SANSA STARK] reminds [LORAS] that they met once before at the tourney of the [HAND] , and he takes his leave after introducing her . lady [OLENNA TYRELL] is a cunning and intelligent [WOMAN] who speaks her mind , and bluntly says that her son [MACE] was a fool for supporting [RENLY] [JOFFREY BARATHEON] ['S] claim to the [THRONE] , though [MARGAERY TYRELL] speaks well of [RENLY] . lady [OLENNA TYRELL] insists that [SANSA STARK] tell her the truth about what [JOFFREY BARATHEON] is like , as he is to marry [MARGAERY TYRELL] .
